फोटो में दिखाई दे रहे कीड़ों के लिए, निम्नलिखित उपाय किए जा सकते हैं:

1. **इंसेक्टिसाइडल साबुन**: यह नरम शरीर वाले कीड़ों को नियंत्रित करने में मदद कर सकता है।
2. **नीम का तेल**: यह एक प्राकृतिक कीटनाशक है जो विभिन्न कीटों को दूर कर सकता है।
3. **नियमित निगरानी**: पौधों पर किसी भी आगे की कीट गतिविधि के संकेतों के लिए ध्यान रखें।

सर्वश्रेष्ठ परिणामों के लिए, स्थानीय कृषि विशेषज्ञ या एक्सटेंशन सेवा से परामर्श करना भी अच्छा रहेगा। यदि आपके पास और प्रश्न हैं, तो बेझिझक पूछें!
messages.en:
For insects visible in the photo, the following measures can be taken:

1. Insecticidal soap: It can help control soft-bodied insects.
2. Neem Oil: It is a natural insecticide that can repel various pests.
3. Regular monitoring: Watch out for signs of any further pest activity on plants.

For best results, it is also a good idea to consult a local agronomist or extension service. If you have further questions, feel free to ask!

messages.content: किन्नू की फ्लोरिंग काम है इसके लिए क्या करें
messages.en: What to do for kinnow flooring work?
messages.standalone_question: What should be done for the flooring work of kinnow?
messages.standalone_en: What should be done for the flooring work of kinnow?
messages.content_transliterated: kinnu ki flooring kaam hai iske liye kya karen

messages.content:
किन्नू की फ्लोरिंग के लिए निम्नलिखित कदम उठाए जा सकते हैं:

1. **सही समय का चयन**: किन्नू की फ्लोरिंग का सबसे अच्छा समय आमतौर पर फूल आने के बाद होता है। यह सुनिश्चित करें कि फल का आकार सही हो।

2. **फ्लोरिंग तकनीक**: 
   - **हाथ से फ्लोरिंग**: फल को धीरे से तोड़ें ताकि शाखाएँ न टूटें।
   - **मशीन से फ्लोरिंग**: यदि आपके पास मशीन है, तो इसे सही तरीके से संचालित करें।

3. **सफाई**: फ्लोरिंग के बाद, फलों को साफ करें और किसी भी खराब फल को हटा दें।

4. **संग्रहण**: फल को ठंडी और सूखी जगह पर संग्रहित करें ताकि वे लंबे समय तक ताजे रहें।

5. **निगरानी**: फ्लोरिंग के बाद फसल की नियमित निगरानी करें ताकि किसी भी कीट या रोग का समय पर उपचार किया जा सके।

यदि आपको और जानकारी या सहायता की आवश्यकता है, तो बेझिझक पूछें!
messages.en:
The following steps can be taken for the flooring of kinnow:

1. Choosing the right time: The best time for flooring kinnow is usually after flowering. Make sure that the size of the fruit is correct.

2. **Flooring Technique**: 
   - **Flooring by hand**: Gently break the fruit so that the branches do not break.
   - **Flooring by machine**: If you have a machine, operate it correctly.

3. **Cleaning**: After flooring, clean the fruit and remove any spoiled fruit.

4. Storage: Store the fruits in a cool and dry place so that they stay fresh for a long time.

5. Monitoring: Monitor the crop regularly after flowering so that any pest or disease can be treated on time.

If you need further information or assistance, feel free to ask!

messages.content: पौधों की फ्लोरिंग नहीं आई है
messages.en: The plants have not been floored
messages.standalone_question: What should be done if the plants have not flowered?
messages.standalone_en: What should be done if the plants have not flowered?
messages.content_transliterated: paudhon ki flooring nahi aayee hai

messages.content:
यदि किन्नू के पौधों की फ्लोरिंग नहीं आई है, तो निम्नलिखित कारणों की जांच करें और उपाय करें:

1. **जलवायु और मौसम**: सुनिश्चित करें कि तापमान और आर्द्रता किन्नू के लिए अनुकूल हैं। अत्यधिक गर्मी या ठंड फ्लोरिंग को प्रभावित कर सकती है।

2. **पोषण**: पौधों को उचित पोषण मिल रहा है या नहीं, इसकी जांच करें। नाइट्रोजन, फास्फोरस और पोटेशियम की सही मात्रा सुनिश्चित करें।

3. **पानी**: पौधों को पर्याप्त पानी मिल रहा है या नहीं, इसकी निगरानी करें। सूखे या अत्यधिक पानी से पौधों की वृद्धि प्रभावित हो सकती है।

4. **कीट और रोग**: पौधों पर किसी भी कीट या रोग के संकेतों की जांच करें। यदि कोई समस्या है, तो उचित कीटनाशक या फफूंदनाशक का उपयोग करें।

5. **फसल प्रबंधन**: पौधों की सही छंटाई और प्रबंधन सुनिश्चित करें ताकि वे स्वस्थ रहें और फ्लोरिंग के लिए तैयार हों।

यदि समस्या बनी रहती है, तो स्थानीय कृषि विशेषज्ञ से परामर्श करना अच्छा रहेगा।
messages.en:
If the flooring of kinnow plants has not come, check for the following causes and take measures:

1. Climate and Weather: Make sure the temperature and humidity are conducive to kinnow. Excessive heat or cold can affect the flooring.

2. Nutrition: Check if the plants are getting proper nutrition. Ensure the right amount of nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium.

3. Watering: Monitor whether the plants are getting enough water. Drought or excessive watering can affect the growth of plants.

4. Pests and Diseases: Check for signs of any pests or diseases on plants. If there is a problem, use the appropriate insecticide or fungicide.

5. Crop Management: Ensure proper pruning and management of plants so that they remain healthy and ready for flooring.

If the problem persists, it is a good idea to consult a local agronomist.

फोटो में दिखाई दे रहे पौधों पर कालापन आमतौर पर फफूंद या अन्य रोगों के कारण हो सकता है। इसके लिए निम्नलिखित उपाय करें:

1. **फफूंदनाशक का उपयोग**: 
   - **कार्बेंडाज़िम**: 2.5 ग्राम प्रति लीटर पानी में मिलाकर पौधों पर छिड़काव करें। यह फफूंद जनित रोगों को नियंत्रित करने में मदद करेगा।

2. **सफाई**: प्रभावित पत्तियों को हटा दें ताकि रोग फैलने से रोका जा सके।

3. **सही जल निकासी**: सुनिश्चित करें कि पौधों की जड़ें पानी में न डूबें, क्योंकि अधिक नमी फफूंद के विकास को बढ़ावा देती है।

4. **नियमित निगरानी**: पौधों की नियमित निगरानी करें और किसी भी अन्य रोग या कीट के संकेतों के लिए ध्यान दें।

यदि समस्या बनी रहती है, तो स्थानीय कृषि विशेषज्ञ से परामर्श करना अच्छा रहेगा।
messages.en:
The blackening of the plants seen in the photo can usually be caused by fungus or other diseases. For this, take the following measures:

1. Use of fungicides: 
   - Carbendazim : Mix 2.5 grams per liter of water and spray on the plants. This will help in controlling fungal diseases.

2. Cleaning: Remove the affected leaves to prevent the disease from spreading.

3. Correct drainage: Make sure that the roots of the plants do not sink into the water, as excess moisture promotes the growth of the fungus.

4. Regular monitoring: Monitor the plants regularly and watch out for any other disease or pest signs.

If the problem persists, it is a good idea to consult a local agronomist.

messages.content:
તમે અપલોડ કરેલ છબીમાં બોટલ ગોર્ડના છોડ સાથે વિકસિત ફળ દેખાઈ રહ્યું છે. પાંદડા સ્વસ્થ લાગે છે, પરંતુ તેમાં થોડા રંગ બદલાવ અથવા નુકસાનના સંકેત છે.

ફળના તબક્કામાં હોવાને કારણે, પાકની ઉપજને અસર કરી શકે તેવા જીવાતો અને રોગો માટે મોનિટર કરવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. પરંતુ, આ પાક અને તબક્કા માટે વિશિષ્ટ સ્પ્રે સૂચનો મળ્યા નથી.

તમારા બોટલ ગોર્ડની આરોગ્ય સુનિશ્ચિત કરવા માટે, નીચેના સામાન્ય અભ્યાસો પર વિચાર કરો:

1. **નિયમિત મોનિટરિંગ**: નિયમિત રીતે જીવાતો અથવા રોગોના કોઈ સંકેતો તપાસો.
2. **પાણી આપવું**: ખાસ કરીને સુકાં સમય દરમિયાન, છોડને પૂરતું પાણી આપવું સુનિશ્ચિત કરો.
3. **પોષણ વ્યવસ્થાપન**: વૃદ્ધિને સમર્થન આપવા માટે સંતુલિત ખાતરો આપો.

જો તમે કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ લક્ષણો અથવા સમસ્યાઓ નોંધો છો, તો વધુ વિગતવાર વિશ્લેષણ માટે કૃપા કરીને વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી પ્રદાન કરો.
messages.en:
The image you uploaded shows the fruit developed with bottle gourd plants. The leaves look healthy, but they have few signs of color change or damage.

Being in the fruit stage, it is important to monitor for pests and diseases that may affect crop yields. But, no specific spray suggestions have been found for this crop and stage.

To ensure the health of your bottle gourd, consider the following general studies:

1. **Regular monitoring**: Check for any signs of pests or diseases on a regular basis.
2. **Watering**: Make sure to give adequate water to the plant, especially during dry spells.
3. **Nutrition Management**: Give balanced fertilizers to support growth.

If you notice any specific features or problems, please provide a more clear image for a more detailed analysis.

messages.content:
બોટલ ગોર્ડના બીજના ઉપચાર માટે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **જંતુનાશક (Insecticide)**: 
   - **Imidacloprid 600 FS** – 5 થી 8 મિલી/kg બીજ

2. **ફંગિસાઇડ (Fungicide)**: 
   - **Thiram** – 2 થી 3 ગ્રામ/kg બીજ

બીજના ઉપચાર દરમિયાન, આ દવાઓને યોગ્ય પ્રમાણમાં ઉપયોગ કરવો મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. જો બીજના ઉછેર દરમિયાન કોઈ રોગો અથવા જીવાતોનો સામનો કરવો પડે, તો વધુ માહિતી માટે કૃપા કરીને પૂછો.
messages.en:
For the treatment of bottle gourd seeds, you can use the following medications:

1. **Pesticide (Insecticide)**: 
   **Imidacloprid 600 FS** – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds

2. **Fungicide (Fungicide)**: 
   * **Thiram** – 2 to 3 g/kg seeds

During seed treatment, it is important to use these drugs in the right amount. If any diseases or pests are encountered during seed rearing, please ask for more information.

messages.content:
Baingan (brinjal) mein pilaspan (powdery mildew) ke liye aapko fungicide ka upyog karna chahiye. Iske liye aap **Carbendazim** ya **Tebuconazole** ka istemal kar sakte hain. 

**Dawai ka upyog:**
- **Carbendazim**: 1-2 g/liter paani mein milakar spray karein.
- **Tebuconazole**: 0.5-1 ml/liter paani mein milakar spray karein.

Yeh dawaiyan aapke baingan ke rogon ko control karne mein madad karengi.

messages.content:

1. **इमिडाक्लोप्रिड**: 0.5-1.0 मिली/लीटर पाण्यात मिसळा.
2. **थायमिथोक्सम**: 0.5 ग्रॅम/लीटर पाण्यात मिसळा.

फवारणी करताना, योग्य प्रमाणात पाण्यात मिसळून संपूर्ण पानांवर चांगल्या प्रकारे फवारणी करा. हे थ्रिप्सच्या नियंत्रणासाठी प्रभावी ठरेल.

1. **Imidacloprid**: Mix with 0.5-1.0 ml/l of water.
2. **Thymethoxam**: Mix with 0.5 g/l of water.

When spraying, mix with the right amount of water and spray well on the entire leaf. This will be effective for the control of thrips.

3. **Natural Pesticides**: Use natural pesticides such as neem oil or pyrimethine.

When spraying, mix with the right amount of water and spray well on the entire leaf. This fruit will be effective for the control of rubbers.

A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

messages.content:
स्प्रे करण्यासाठी खालील पद्धतींचा वापर करा:

1. **सामग्री तयार करा**: योग्य कीटकनाशक किंवा फंगीसाइड निवडा. त्याच्या पॅकेजिंगवर दिलेल्या निर्देशांचे पालन करा.

2. **पाण्यात मिसळा**: आवश्यक प्रमाणात पाण्यात कीटकनाशक किंवा फंगीसाइड मिसळा. 

3. **स्प्रे उपकरण तयार करा**: स्प्रेयरची तपासणी करा आणि त्यात तयार केलेले मिश्रण भरा.

4. **स्प्रे करण्याची वेळ**: सकाळी किंवा संध्याकाळी स्प्रे करणे चांगले, जेव्हा तापमान कमी असते आणि वारा कमी असतो.

5. **स्प्रे करा**: पिकांच्या पानांवर आणि खोडांवर समानपणे स्प्रे करा. 

6. **सुरक्षा उपाय**: स्प्रे करताना हातमोजे, मास्क आणि चष्मा वापरा.

7. **स्प्रे केल्यानंतर**: स्प्रे केल्यानंतर काही तासांपर्यंत पाण्याचा संपर्क टाळा.

तुमच्या पिकांसाठी योग्य स्प्रे पद्धतींचा वापर करा. आणखी काही विचारायचं असल्यास सांगा!
messages.en:
Use the following methods to spray:

1. **Make ingredients**: Choose the right pesticide or fungicide. Follow the instructions on its packaging.

2. **Mix with water**: Mix pesticides or fungicides in the required amount of water. 

3. **Make a spray device**: Inspect the sprayer and fill it with the finished mixture.

4. **Spray time**: It is best to spray in the morning or evening, when the temperature is low and the wind is low.

5. *spray**: Spray evenly on the leaves and stems of crops. 

6. **Safety measures**: Use gloves, masks and glasses when spraying.

7. **After spraying**: Avoid contact with water for a few hours after spraying.

Use the right spray methods for your crops. Let me know if you have anything more to ask!

messages.content:
आपल्या प्लॉट "Manikchaman" साठी फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (आठवडा 1)
**पिकाचे नाव:** द्राक्षे  
**सुरुवात तारीख:** 3 जुलै 2025  
**सध्याचा टप्पा:** टॉपिंग

#### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - फेरस सल्फेट: 500 ग्रॅम/एकर
  - मँगनीज सल्फेट: 500 ग्रॅम/एकर
- **टीप:** फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म पोषक तत्वांचा एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावा, उदाहरणार्थ 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलो.

#### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट: 2 किलो/एकर
  - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 80%: 3 किलो/एकर
- **टीप:** फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल इतर फर्टिलायझर्सच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (आठवडा 2)
**सुरुवात तारीख:** 2 ऑक्टोबर 2025

#### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - झिंक ऑक्साइड: 200 ग्रॅम/एकर

#### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट: 2 किलो/एकर
  - सल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश: 6.5 किलो/एकर

आपल्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकासाठी योग्य फर्टिगेशन पद्धतींचा वापर करून अधिक उत्पादन मिळवू शकता.
messages.en:
The fertigation schedule for your plot "Manikchaman" is as follows:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1)
**Name of the crop:** Grapes  
**Start date:** July 3, 2025  
**Current stage:** Topping

#### In a Folier way:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  Ferrous sulfate: 500 g/acre
  Manganese sulfate: 500 g/acre
* **Note:* The concentration of micronutrients in foliar spray should not exceed 1%, for example 5 kg in 500 liters of water.

#### In a fertigation manner:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  - Magnesium sulfate: 2 kg/acre
  Phosphoric acid 80%: 3 kg/acre
- **Note:** Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before application to other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 2)
**Start date:** October 2, 2025

#### In a Folier way:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  - Zinc oxide: 200 g/acre

#### In a fertigation manner:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  - Magnesium sulfate: 2 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 6.5 kg/acre

You can get more yield by using the right fertigation methods for your grape crop.

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

आपल्या "Manikchaman" प्लॉटसाठी, सध्या आपण "Subcane" टप्प्यात आहात, जो 5 व्या आठवड्यात आहे. 

### सध्याचा खताचा कार्यक्रम:
- **खत वितरण पद्धत:** 
  - **मैग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 1 किलोग्राम/एकर
  - **पोटॅशियम सल्फेट:** 6.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

### पुढील खताचा कार्यक्रम:
1. **टॉपिंग (Topping) - 1 व्या आठवड्यात:**
   - **फोलिअर पद्धत:** 
     - **फेरस सल्फेट:** 500 ग्रॅम/एकर
     - **मँगनीज सल्फेट:** 500 ग्रॅम/एकर
     - **सूचना:** फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म पोषण घटकांचा एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावा.
   - **तारीख:** 2025-07-08

2. **टॉपिंग (Topping) - 1 व्या आठवड्यात:**
   - **खत वितरण पद्धत:** 
     - **मैग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
     - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल:** 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
     - **सूचना:** फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.
   - **तारीख:** 2025-07-08

आपण या कार्यक्रमानुसार खतांचा वापर करू शकता.

   - **तारीख:** 2025-07-08

2. **टॉपिंग (Topping) - 1 व्या आठवड्यात:**
   - **खत वितरण पद्धत:** 
     - **मैग्नेशियम सल्फेट:** 2 किलोग्राम/एकर
     - **फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल:** 3 किलोग्राम/एकर
     - **सूचना:** फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल इतर खतांच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.
   - **तारीख:** 2025-07-08

आपण या कार्यक्रमानुसार खतांचा वापर करू शकता.
messages.en:
For your "Manicchaman" plot, you're currently in the "Subcane" phase, which is in week 5. 

### Current fertilizer program:
- **Fertilizer distribution method:** 
  - **Magnesium sulfate:** 1 kg/acre
  - **Potassium sulfate:** 6.5 kg/acre

### The following fertilizer program:
1. **Topping - Week 1:**
   - **Folière method:** 
     - **Ferrous sulfate:** 500 g/acre
     - **Manganese sulfate:** 500 g/acre
     * **Instructions:** The concentration of micronutrients in foliar spray should not exceed 1%.
   - **Date:** 2025-07-08

2. **Topping - Week 1:**
   - **Fertilizer distribution method:** 
     - **Magnesium sulfate:** 2 kg/acre
     - **Phosphoric acid:** 3 kg/acre
     * **Instructions:** Apply phosphoric acid separately for 15-20 minutes before application of other fertilizers.
   - **Date:** 2025-07-08

You can use fertilizers according to this program.

messages.content:
आपल्या "Manikchaman" प्लॉटसाठी, सध्या आपण "Subcane" टप्प्यात आहात. या टप्प्यात, पिकाच्या पोषणासाठी खालील पोषक तत्वांची आवश्यकता आहे:

### पोषणाची आवश्यकता:
1. **नायट्रोजन (N):** पिकाच्या वाढीसाठी महत्त्वाचे आहे.
2. **फॉस्फरस (P):** मुळांच्या विकासासाठी आणि फुलांच्या उत्पादनासाठी आवश्यक आहे.
3. **पोटॅशियम (K):** पिकाच्या आरोग्यासाठी आणि प्रतिकारशक्तीसाठी महत्त्वाचे आहे.

आपण या पोषण तत्वांचा वापर करून आपल्या पिकाची वाढ सुधारू शकता. जर आपल्याला विशिष्ट खतांचा वापर करायचा असेल, तर कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
For your "Manikchaman" plot, you're currently in the "Subcane" phase. At this stage, the following nutrients are needed to nourish the crop:

### Nutrition Needs:
1. *Nitrogen (N):** is important for crop growth.
2. *Phosphorus (P):** is essential for the development of roots and the production of flowers.
3. **Potassium (K):** is important for crop health and immunity.

You can improve the growth of your crop by using these nutrients. If you want to use certain fertilizers, please let me know.

messages.content: द्राक्ष बागेमध्ये किती प्रकारचे कीटक आहेत?
messages.en: How many types of insects are there in a vineyard?
messages.standalone_question: How many types of insects are there in a vineyard?
messages.standalone_en: How many types of insects are there in a vineyard?
messages.content_transliterated: draks bagemadhye kiti prakarache kitak ahet?

messages.content:
द्राक्ष बागेमध्ये खालील प्रकारचे कीटक आहेत:

1. अपिड्स (Aphids)
2. बायहार हॅरी कॅटरपिलर (Bihar hairy caterpillar)
3. ब्रॉड माइट्स (Broad mites)
4. ब्राउन प्लांट हॉपर्स (Brown plant hopper)
5. कॅप्सूल बोरर (Capsule borer)
6. कॅटरपिलर (Caterpillar)
7. सिट्रस सायला (Citrus Psylla)
8. कट वर्म (Cut worm)
9. अर्ली शूट बोरर (Early shoot borer)
10. युरोपियन रेड माइट्स (European red mites)
11. फ्लॅट माइट्स (Flat mites)
12. फ्लिया बीटल (Flea Beetle)
13. फ्रूट बोरर (Fruit Borer)
14. फ्रूट फ्लाय (Fruit Fly)
15. ग्रीन अपिड्स (Green aphids)
16. हिस्पा बीटल (Hispa beetle)
17. जॅसिड्स (Jassids)
18. लीफ ईटिंग कॅटरपिलर (Leaf eating caterpillar)
19. लीफ फोल्डर (Leaf folder)
20. लीफ माइनर (Leaf miner)
21. लीफ रोलर (Leaf roller)
22. मँगो हॉपर्स (Mango hopper)
23. मीली बग (Mealy Bug)
24. माइट्स (Mites)
25. पिन वर्म (Pin worm)
26. पिंक बॉलवॉर्म (Pink bollworm)
27. रेड स्पायडर माइट्स (Red Spider Mites)
28. राईझोम वील (Rhizome weevil)
29. रूट ग्रब्स (Root Grubs)
30. रूट नॉट नेमाटोड (Root knot nematode)
31. स्पोडोप्टेरा (Spodoptera)
32. स्टेम बोरर (Stem Borer)
33. थ्रिप्स (Thrips)
34. व्हाइट फ्लाय (White Fly)

या सर्व कीटक द्राक्ष बागेमध्ये आढळू शकतात.

messages.content: द्राक्ष बागेतील कीटक नाश करण्याकरिता कोणते कीटकनाशक वापरले जाऊ शकतात
messages.en: What pesticides can be used to kill insects in vineyards
messages.standalone_question: What insecticides can be used to eliminate pests in grape vineyards?
messages.standalone_en: What insecticides can be used to eliminate pests in grape vineyards?

faq:
Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

messages.content_transliterated: draks bagetil kitak nash karanyakarita conte kitakanashak vaparale jaau shakatat

messages.content:
द्राक्ष बागेतील कीटक नाश करण्यासाठी खालील कीटकनाशकांचा वापर केला जाऊ शकतो:

1. **इमिडाक्लोप्रिड (Imidacloprid)** - हे एक व्यापक कीटकनाशक आहे, जे अनेक प्रकारच्या कीटकांवर प्रभावी आहे.
2. **थायमिथोक्सम (Thiamethoxam)** - हे कीटकांवर प्रभावी असून, विशेषतः अपिड्स आणि थ्रिप्ससारख्या कीटकांवर वापरले जाते.
3. **क्लोरपायरीफॉस (Chlorpyrifos)** - हे एक सामान्य कीटकनाशक आहे, जे विविध कीटकांवर प्रभावी आहे.
4. **स्पिनोसाड (Spinosad)** - हे जैविक कीटकनाशक आहे, जे थ्रिप्स आणि इतर कीटकांवर प्रभावी आहे.
5. **पायरेथ्रॉइड्स (Pyrethroids)** - हे एक समूह आहे कीटकनाशकांचा, जे विविध कीटकांवर प्रभावी असतात.

या कीटकनाशकांचा वापर करताना, योग्य प्रमाण आणि वापराच्या पद्धतींचा विचार करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. तसेच, स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घेणे देखील उपयुक्त ठरू शकते.
messages.en:
The following pesticides can be used to kill insects in vineyards:

1. **Imidacloprid (Imidacloprid)** - It is a widespread pesticide, which is effective against many types of insects.
2. **Thymethoxam (Thiamethoxam)** - It is effective on insects, especially used on insects such as epidips and thrips.
3. **Chlorpyrifos (Chlorpyrifos)** - It is a common pesticide, which is effective on various insects.
4. **Spinosad)** - It is a biological pesticide, which is effective on thrips and other insects.
5. **Pyrethroids** - This is a group of pesticides, which are effective against various insects.

When using these pesticides, it is important to consider the right quantity and methods of use. Also, it may be helpful to consult a local agricultural expert.

messages.content:
द्राक्ष बागेला खालील प्रकारच्या बुरशा येऊ शकतात:

1. **अल्टरनारिया (Alternaria)** - पानांवर काळे ठिपके तयार करतो.
2. **अँथ्रॅक्नोज (Anthracnose)** - फळांवर काळे किंवा भुरे ठिपके तयार करतो.
3. **डाऊनी मिल्ड्यू (Downy Mildew)** - पानांच्या तळाशी पांढरे किंवा पांढरे धुके तयार करतो.
4. **ग्रे मोल्ड (Grey Mold)** - फळांवर आणि पानांवर ग्रे रंगाचा कव्हर तयार करतो.
5. **फ्युसेरियम विल्ट (Fusarium Wilt)** - वनस्पतींच्या मुळांवर परिणाम करतो, ज्यामुळे वनस्पती मरण पावतात.
6. **पावडरी मिल्ड्यू (Powdery Mildew)** - पानांवर पांढरे धुके तयार करतो.
7. **लेट ब्लाइट (Late Blight)** - पानांवर काळे ठिपके आणि सड येतो.

या बुरशांमुळे द्राक्षांच्या उत्पादनावर गंभीर परिणाम होऊ शकतो, त्यामुळे योग्य नियंत्रण आणि उपचार आवश्यक आहेत.
messages.en:
The following types of burrows can occur in a vineyard:

1. **Alternaria** - Forms black dots on the leaves.
2. **Anthracnose*** - Forms black or brown dots on the fruit.
3. **Downy Mildew)** - Forms white or white mist at the bottom of the leaves.
4. **Grey Mold** - Forms a grey cover on fruits and leaves.
5. **Fusarium wilt** - Affects the roots of plants, causing plant death.
6. **Powdery mildew** - Produces white mist on the leaves.
7. **Late Blight** - Leaves have black dots and rot.

These fungi can have a serious impact on the production of grapes, so proper control and treatment are necessary.

messages.content:
द्राक्ष बागेतील सर्व प्रकारच्या बुरशा नाश करण्यासाठी खालील बुरशीनाशकांचा वापर केला जाऊ शकतो:

1. **फ्लुट्रिमॉक्सायन (Flutriafol)** - विविध बुरशांवर प्रभावी आहे, विशेषतः पावडरी मिल्ड्यू आणि डाऊनी मिल्ड्यूवर.
2. **बोर्डो मिश्रण (Bordeaux Mixture)** - हे एक पारंपरिक बुरशीनाशक आहे, जे विविध बुरशांवर प्रभावी आहे.
3. **कॅप्टन (Captan)** - हे बुरशांवर प्रभावी असून, विशेषतः फळांवर येणाऱ्या बुरशांवर वापरले जाते.
4. **थिराम (Thiram)** - हे बुरशांवर प्रभावी असून, बुरशीजन्य रोगांच्या नियंत्रणासाठी वापरले जाते.
5. **मेटालॅक्सिल (Metalaxyl)** - विशेषतः डाऊनी मिल्ड्यूवर प्रभावी आहे.

या बुरशीनाशकांचा वापर करताना, योग्य प्रमाण आणि वापराच्या पद्धतींचा विचार करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. तसेच, स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घेणे देखील उपयुक्त ठरू शकते.
messages.en:
The following fungicides can be used to destroy all types of fungi in vineyards:

1. **Flutrimoxin (Flutriafol)** - Effective on a variety of fungi, especially powdery mildew and downey mildew.
2. **Bordeaux Mixture** - It is a traditional fungicide, which is effective against various fungicides.
3. **Captain (Captan)** - It is effective on bursaries, especially those that come on fruits.
4. **Thiram (Thiram)** - It is effective against fungi and is used for the control of fungal diseases.
5. **Metalaxyl** - Especially effective on downy mildew.

When using these fungicides, it is important to consider the right quantity and methods of use. Also, it may be helpful to consult a local agricultural expert.

messages.content:
द्राक्ष बागेतील पानांच्या वाट्या होणे म्हणजे पानांच्या कडांवर किंवा मध्यभागी पांढरे किंवा पिवळे ठिपके किंवा रेषा दिसणे. यामुळे खालील कारणे असू शकतात:

1. **बुरशीजन्य रोग**: पावडरी मिल्ड्यू किंवा डाऊनी मिल्ड्यू सारख्या बुरशांमुळे पानांच्या वाट्या होऊ शकतात.
2. **पोषणाची कमतरता**: विशेषतः नायट्रोजन, जस्त किंवा मॅग्नेशियमच्या कमतरतेमुळे पानांच्या वाट्या होऊ शकतात.
3. **कीटकांचा प्रादुर्भाव**: अपिड्स किंवा थ्रिप्स सारख्या कीटकांमुळे पानांच्या कडांवर नुकसान होऊ शकते.
4. **पाण्याची कमतरता**: पाण्याची कमी किंवा अनियमित पाण्याचा पुरवठा पानांच्या आरोग्यावर परिणाम करू शकतो.

या समस्येवर उपाय म्हणून, योग्य बुरशीनाशकांचा वापर, पोषणाची तपासणी, आणि कीटक नियंत्रणाची पद्धत वापरणे आवश्यक आहे. स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घेणे देखील उपयुक्त ठरू शकते.
messages.en:
Leaf bowls in a vineyard are the appearance of white or yellow dots or lines on the edges or center of the leaves. This may cause the following:

1. **Fungal disease**: Fungi such as powdered mildew or downy mildew can cause leaf bowls.
2. **Nutritional deficiencies**: Deficiency of nitrogen, zinc, or magnesium in particular can cause leaf bowls.
3. **Insect infestation**: Insects such as apids or thrips can cause damage to the edges of the leaves.
4. **Water scarcity**: Low or irregular water supply of water can affect the health of the leaves.

To address this problem, it is necessary to use proper fungicides, nutritional screening, and methods of pest control. It may also be helpful to consult a local agricultural expert.

messages.content:
For controlling bacterial blight, you can use the following measures:

1. **Fungicide Application**: Use a suitable fungicide like Copper Oxychloride or Streptomycin Sulfate. Follow the manufacturer's instructions for dosage and application frequency.

2. **Cultural Practices**:
   - Ensure proper spacing between plants for good air circulation.
   - Remove and destroy infected plant debris to reduce disease spread.

3. **Resistant Varieties**: If available, consider planting resistant varieties of the crop.

4. **Sanitation**: Keep tools and equipment clean to prevent the spread of the disease.

If you need specific spray recommendations or further assistance, please let me know!

messages.content:
बोर्डो मिश्रण तयार करण्यासाठी तुम्हाला खालील घटकांची आवश्यकता आहे:

1. **कॉपर सल्फेट** (Copper Sulfate) - 1 किलो
2. **कॅल्शियम हायड्रॉक्साइड** (Calcium Hydroxide) - 1 किलो
3. **पाणी** - 100 लिटर

**तयारीची पद्धत:**
1. कॉपर सल्फेटला पाण्यात विरघळा.
2. दुसऱ्या पाण्यात कॅल्शियम हायड्रॉक्साइडला विरघळा.
3. दोन्ही मिश्रण एकत्र करा आणि चांगले ढवळा.

हे मिश्रण फवारणीसाठी तयार आहे. फवारणी करताना योग्य प्रमाण आणि पद्धतींचा विचार करा.
messages.en:
To make a Bordeaux blend, you need the following ingredients:

1. **Copper Sulfate** (Copper Sulfate) - 1 kg
2. **Calcium Hydroxide** (Calcium Hydroxide) - 1 kg
3. **Water** - 100 litres

**Method of preparation:**
1. Dissolve copper sulfate in water.
2. Dissolve calcium hydroxide in another water.
3. Combine both mixtures and stir well.

The mixture is ready for spraying. Consider the right quantity and methods when spraying.

messages.content:
फवारणी केलेले माहिती भरण्यासाठी तुम्हाला खालील गोष्टींची आवश्यकता असेल:

1. **फवारणीची तारीख:** तुम्ही फवारणी केल्याची तारीख.
2. **फवारणीचा प्रकार:** तुम्ही कोणता कीटकनाशक किंवा फफूंदनाशक वापरले.
3. **अवश्यकता:** तुम्हाला का फवारणी करायची होती, म्हणजे कोणत्या रोग किंवा कीटकांपासून संरक्षण करायचे होते.
4. **अवशेष:** फवारणी केल्यानंतर तुम्हाला कोणते परिणाम दिसले का.

तुम्ही या माहितीचा वापर करून फवारणीची माहिती भरू शकता. तुम्हाला अधिक मदतीची आवश्यकता असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:

1. **Date of spraying:** Date of spraying.
2. **Type of spraying:** What pesticide or fungicide did you use?
3. **need:** Why did you want to spray, i.e., what diseases or insects did you want to protect against?
4. **Residue:** Did you see any effects after spraying?

You can use this information to fill in the spraying information. If you need more help, please let me know!

messages.content: चांगली गर्भधारणा होण्या साठी काय करावे
messages.en: What to do to have a good pregnancy
messages.standalone_question: What should be done to ensure a good pregnancy?
messages.standalone_en: What should be done to ensure a good pregnancy?
messages.content_transliterated: changali garbhadharana honya sathi kay karave

messages.content:
चांगली गर्भधारणा होण्यासाठी खालील गोष्टींचा विचार करा:

1. **उत्तम दर्जाचे बियाणे वापरा**: चांगल्या गुणवत्तेची बियाणे निवडा.
2. **बियाणे उपचार**: बियाणे कीडनाशक, फंगीसाइड आणि जैविक एजंटसह उपचारित करा.
3. **मातीची आरोग्य तपासणी**: मातीची गुणवत्ता आणि पोषणतत्त्वे तपासा.
4. **सिंचन**: योग्य प्रमाणात पाणी द्या, जेणेकरून मातीची आर्द्रता योग्य राहील.
5. **सूर्यप्रकाश**: पिकांना पुरेसा सूर्यप्रकाश मिळावा याची काळजी घ्या.
6. **सुरक्षित अंतर**: बियाणे पेरताना योग्य अंतर ठेवा, जेणेकरून प्रत्येक पिकाला आवश्यक जागा मिळेल.

या सर्व गोष्टींचा विचार करून तुम्ही चांगली गर्भधारणा साधू शकता.
messages.en:
To have a good pregnancy, consider the following:

1. **Use good quality seeds**: Choose good quality seeds.
2. **Seed Treatment**: Treat the seeds with pesticides, fungicides, and biological agents.
3. **Soil health check**: Check soil quality and nutrients.
4. **Irrigation**: Give the right amount of water, so that the soil moisture is right.
5. **Sunlight**: Make sure the crops get enough sunlight.
6. **Safe distance**: Keep a proper distance while sowing seeds, so that each crop gets the required space.

By considering all these things, you can get a good pregnancy.

messages.content:
द्राक्षांच्या "Break Bud" अवस्थेत (सुरूवात 6 मार्च 2025) सध्या तुम्हाला पुढील फर्टिगेशन करणे आवश्यक आहे:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (आठवडा 3):
1. **फर्टिलायझर**:
   - **12-61-0**: 4 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 4.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

   किंवा

   - **24-24-0**: 5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 किलोग्राम/एकर

   किंवा

   - **Calcium nitrate**: 7.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (आठवडा 1, "Cane thinning" अवस्था):
- **सुरूवात**: 3 एप्रिल 2025
- **फर्टिलायझर**:
   - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3 किलोग्राम/एकर

   किंवा

   - **0-60-20**: 7 किलोग्राम/एकर

   किंवा

   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 5.5 किलोग्राम/एकर
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 किलोग्राम/एकर

### नोट्स:
- **Phosphoric acid**: इतर फर्टिलायझरच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावी.
- **Calcium nitrate**: इतर फर्टिलायझरच्या अनुप्रयोगानंतर 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावी.

या शेड्यूलनुसार फर्टिगेशन करा, जेणेकरून तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या उत्पादनात सुधारणा होईल.
messages.en:
In the "break bud" phase of grapes (starting March 6, 2025), you currently need to perform the following fertigation:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 3):
1. **Fertilizer**:
   - **12-61-0**: 4 kg/acre
   - **Calcium nitrate**: 4.5 kg/acre

or

- **24-24-0**: 5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 2 kg/acre

or

- **Calcium nitrate**: 7.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3.5 kg/acre

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 1, "Cane Thinning" Status):
- **Start**: 3 April 2025
- **Fertilizer**:
   - **Mono potassium phosphate**: 3.5 kg/acre
   - **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 3 kg/acre

or

- **0-60-20**: 7 kg/acre

or

- **Phosphoric acid 80%**: 5.5 kg/acre
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 2.5 kg/acre

### Notes:
**Phosphoric acid**: Apply separately for 15-20 minutes before application to other fertilizers.
* Calcium nitrate**: Apply separately for 15-20 minutes after application to other fertilizers.

Fertigation according to this schedule, so that your grape production improves.

### Foliar Spray Recommendations:
1. **Zinc Sulphate**: 800 gm/acre
2. **Ferrous Sulphate**: 600 gm/acre

### Important Note:
- The concentration of micro-nutrient fertilizers for foliar spray should not exceed 1%. For example, you can mix 5 kg of the above nutrients in 500 liters of water per acre.

Make sure to follow these guidelines for effective nutrient application!

messages.en: Suggest the best chemical drug for nematodes
messages.standalone_question: What is the best chemical treatment for nematodes?
messages.standalone_en: What is the best chemical treatment for nematodes?

messages.content:
For controlling nematodes in your potato crop, you can use the following recommended chemical treatments:

### Recommended Nematicides:
1. **Carbofuran**: Apply at the rate of 1-2 kg/acre.
2. **Furadan**: Use 1-2 kg/acre as per the manufacturer's instructions.
3. **Neem Cake**: Incorporate 250-500 kg/acre into the soil as a natural nematicide.

### Application Tips:
- Apply these treatments before planting or during the early stages of crop growth for best results.
- Ensure proper soil moisture for effective penetration of the nematicides.

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions for application rates and safety precautions!

messages.en: Su for nematode when the crop is 80 days old?
messages.standalone_question: What should be done for nematode control if the potato crop is 80 days old?
messages.standalone_en: What should be done for nematode control if the potato crop is 80 days old?

messages.content:
For your potato crop that is 80 days old, you can take the following measures to control nematodes:

### Recommended Actions:
1. **Nematicides**: 
   - **Carbofuran**: Apply at the rate of 1-2 kg/acre.
   - **Furadan**: Use 1-2 kg/acre as per the manufacturer's instructions.

2. **Cultural Practices**:
   - **Crop Rotation**: Rotate with non-host crops like marigold or mustard to break the nematode life cycle.
   - **Soil Solarization**: Cover the soil with clear plastic for several weeks to heat the soil and kill nematodes.

3. **Organic Options**:
   - **Neem Cake**: Incorporate 250-500 kg/acre into the soil as a natural nematicide.

### Application Tips:
- Apply these treatments according to the manufacturer's instructions and ensure proper soil moisture for effective penetration.

Regular monitoring of the crop for any signs of nematode damage is also essential!

messages.content:
હા, આજે (26 ડિસેમ્બર 2024) રોગો માટે દવા આપવી જોઈએ. અહીં કેટલીક દવા અને તેમના ઉપયોગની માહિતી છે:

1. **લેટ બ્લાઇટ માટે**:
   - **Metalaxyl Mancozeb**: 2.5 ગ્રામ/લિટર પાણીમાં
   - **Dimethomorph**: 1.2 ગ્રામ/લિટર પાણીમાં
   - **Cymoxanil 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP**: 2 ગ્રામ/લિટર પાણીમાં

2. **અર્લી બ્લાઇટ માટે**:
   - **Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC**: 1 મીલીલિટર/લિટર પાણીમાં
   - **Chlorothalonil**: 2 ગ્રામ/લિટર પાણીમાં
   - **Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP**: 2 ગ્રામ/લિટર પાણીમાં

3. **ઍફિડ્સ, થ્રિપ્સ અને વ્હાઇટફ્લાય માટે**:
   - **Tolfenpyrad 15% EC**: 1.25 મીલીલિટર/લિટર પાણીમાં
   - **Spirotetramat + Imidacloprid**: 0.8 મીલીલિટર/લિટર પાણીમાં
   - **Pyrifluquinazon 20% WG**: 1 ગ્રામ/લિટર પાણીમાં
   - **Broflanilide 300G/L SC**: 0.4 મીલીલિટર/લિટર પાણીમાં

આ દવાઓને ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે તરીકે લાગુ કરો.
messages.en:
Yes, medicine should be given for diseases today (December 26, 2024). Here is information on some drugs and their uses:

1. **For late blight**:
   * **Metalaxyl Mancozeb**: In 2.5 g/litre of water
   **Dimethomorph**: in 1.2 g/litre of water
   * **Cymoxanil 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP**: 2 g/litre in water

2. **For Early Blight**:
   - **Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC**: 1 millilitre/liter in water
   * **Chlorothalonil**: in 2 g/l of water
   * *Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP**: 2 g/l in water

3. **For aphids, thrips and whitefly**:
   * **Tolfenpyrad 15% EC**: 1.25 ml/litre in water
   * **Spirotetramat + Imidacloprid**: 0.8 milliliters/litre in water
   - **Pyrifluquinazon 20% WG**: 1 g/litre in water
   * **Broflanilide 300G/L SC**: 0.4 milliliters/liter in water

Apply these drugs as foliar sprays.

messages.content:
कांद्याच्या पानांवर खाली बसलेल्या पानांवर फवारणी करण्यासाठी, तुम्ही खालील फवारणींचा विचार करू शकता:

1. **फफूंदनाशक (Fungicides)**: पानांवर फफूंदीच्या संक्रमणाची शक्यता असल्यास, योग्य फफूंदनाशक वापरा.
2. **कीटकनाशक (Insecticides)**: जर पानांवर कीटकांचा प्रकोप असेल, तर कीटकनाशक वापरणे आवश्यक आहे.
3. **पोषणात्मक फवारणी (Nutritional Foliar Spray)**: पानांच्या आरोग्यासाठी आवश्यक पोषण तत्वांची फवारणी करणे.

तुमच्या पिकाच्या विशिष्ट परिस्थितीवर आधारित योग्य फवारणी निवडणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. तुम्हाला अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया पिकाची स्थिती आणि कोणते कीटक किंवा रोग आहेत हे सांगा.
tell me about diseases in mango
messages.standalone_question: What are the diseases that affect mango trees?
messages.standalone_en: What are the diseases that affect mango trees?

messages.content:
Mango trees can be affected by several diseases, including:

1. **Anthracnose**: Caused by the fungus Colletotrichum, it leads to dark, sunken lesions on fruits and leaves, affecting fruit quality.

2. **Powdery Mildew**: This fungal disease appears as a white powdery coating on leaves and young shoots, leading to leaf drop and reduced fruit yield.

3. **Bacterial Canker**: Caused by the bacterium Xanthomonas, it results in cankers on branches and leaves, leading to dieback.

4. **Leaf Spot**: Various fungi can cause leaf spots, leading to premature leaf drop and reduced photosynthesis.

5. **Downy Mildew**: This disease causes yellowing of leaves and can lead to defoliation.

6. **Mango Sudden Death Syndrome**: A serious condition that causes rapid wilting and death of trees, often linked to environmental stress and pathogens.

7. **Fruit Rot**: Various fungi can cause rotting of mango fruits, especially during storage.

Proper management practices, including good sanitation, resistant varieties, and timely fungicide applications, can help control these diseases.
what sprays we should opt to avoid flower drop in chilli
messages.standalone_question: What types of sprays can be used to prevent flower drop in chili plants?
messages.standalone_en: What types of sprays can be used to prevent flower drop in chili plants?

messages.content:
To avoid flower drop in chilli plants, you can consider the following sprays:

1. **Plant Growth Regulators**: 
   - **Gibberellic Acid (GA3)**: Helps in promoting flower retention. Use at a concentration of 50-100 ppm.

2. **Nutrient Sprays**:
   - **Potassium Nitrate**: Enhances flower and fruit set. Spray 1-2% solution during flowering.
   - **Calcium Nitrate**: Helps in strengthening cell walls and reducing flower drop. Use a 1-2% solution.

3. **Fungicides**: 
   - If flower drop is due to fungal infections, consider using fungicides like **Carbendazim** or **Mancozeb**.

4. **Insecticides**: 
   - Control pests that may cause stress to the plants, such as aphids or thrips, using insecticides like **Imidacloprid** or **Thiamethoxam**.

5. **Foliar Nutrient Solutions**: 
   - Use a balanced foliar nutrient solution that includes micronutrients like Boron and Zinc, which are essential for flower development.

Make sure to apply these sprays during the early morning or late evening to avoid phytotoxicity and ensure better absorption. Always follow the recommended dosages and safety precautions.

messages.content:
Chilli crop lo putta ralaKunda (flower drop) ni thagginchadaniki, ila cheyyandi:

1. **Nutrient Management**:
   - **Potassium**: Potassium-rich fertilizers (like Potassium Nitrate) use cheyyandi, idhi flower set ni improve chestundi.
   - **Calcium**: Calcium Nitrate spray cheyyandi, idhi flower drop ni thaggistundi.

2. **Plant Growth Regulators**:
   - **Gibberellic Acid (GA3)**: 50-100 ppm concentration lo spray cheyyandi, idhi flowers ni retain cheyadaniki sahayapadutundi.

3. **Pest Control**:
   - Pests (like aphids, thrips) ni control cheyyandi. **Imidacloprid** or **Thiamethoxam** use cheyyandi.

4. **Fungicide Application**:
   - Fungal infections valla flower drop jarigite, **Carbendazim** or **Mancozeb** spray cheyyandi.

5. **Foliar Nutrient Solutions**:
   - Boron and Zinc ni kaligi unna foliar nutrient solution spray cheyyandi, idhi flower development ki avasaram.

6. **Water Management**:
   - Adequate irrigation maintain cheyyandi, stress ni thaggistundi.

7. **Environmental Conditions**:
   - Temperature and humidity ni monitor cheyyandi, extreme conditions valla flower drop avvachu.

Ivi chesi, flower drop ni thagginchukovachu. Regular ga monitoring chesi, timely actions teesukondi.

messages.content:
Chilli crop lo lakunda (leaf curl) ni thagginchadaniki, ila cheyyandi:

1. **Pest Control**:
   - **Aphids**: Leaf curl ki main reason. **Imidacloprid** or **Thiamethoxam** use cheyyandi.
   - **Thrips**: Thrips ni control cheyadaniki **Chlorpyrifos** or **Spinosad** spray cheyyandi.

2. **Nutrient Management**:
   - Balanced fertilizers use cheyyandi, especially Nitrogen, Phosphorus, and Potassium, to maintain plant health.

3. **Water Management**:
   - Adequate irrigation maintain cheyyandi, stress ni thaggistundi. Overwatering kuda avoid cheyyandi.

4. **Fungal Diseases**:
   - Fungal infections valla kuda leaf curl avvachu. **Mancozeb** or **Carbendazim** spray cheyyandi.

5. **Regular Monitoring**:
   - Plants ni regular ga check chesi, early signs of pests or diseases ni identify cheyyandi.

6. **Cultural Practices**:
   - Crop rotation and proper sanitation practices follow cheyyandi to reduce pest populations.

7. **Resistant Varieties**:
   - Lakunda ki resistant varieties ni select cheyyandi, if available.

Ivi chesi, lakunda ni thagginchukovachu. Regular monitoring and timely actions teesukondi.

Gives the irrigation requirement forecast for any day, today and beyond. Dates are mandatory. Output is humanized with day of the week and optimal moisture details if suitable.

get_fertigation_schedule  
Checks the farmer's crop stages and requirements with internal petiole reports and gives the current week fertigation schedule details, and details of the next fertigation schedule (could be next week in the same crop stage or in next crop stage) for the plots. Fertilizers are given by 3 distribution methods:  
- Fertigation: fertilizers put into the irrigation pipeline itself  
- Foliar: on the leaves using a foliar spray  
- Soil: directly on the soil  
If the unit of fertilizer amount includes "per acre", then it is for 1 acre. Otherwise it is for "units per 1 plant".
faq:
Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

faq:
Q: How to measure/ calculate irrigation hours /water tank of my plot in fyllo app? How do I calculate irrigation hours for my plot? How to use the irrigation hours calculator?
A: To calculate irrigation hours in the Fyllo app, follow these steps:

1. Open the Fyllo App
2. Go to the home screen
3. Click on the soil moisture-1 sensor
4. Scroll down to find the "Irrigation hours" section
5. Fill in the required details such as:
   - Root width (inches)
   - Root depth (inches)
   - Soil retention (mm)
   - Dripper distance (feet)
   - Dripper discharge (liters)
6. Click the calculate button

Would you like me to calculate the irrigation hours for you right now? I can retrieve your plot's irrigation settings and perform the calculation if you say yes.

Tool Selection: When user says yes, I should:
1. Use get_irrigation_installation_settings tool to retrieve plot settings
2. Check if all values are present and valid
3. If values are valid, use calculate_irrigation_hours tool with these values
4. If values are missing or invalid, ask the user to provide the missing values
5. After calculating irrigation hours, display the irrigation installation settings that were used for the calculation
6. Ask the user if they want to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values, and if yes, prompt them to provide those values

Example response if values are missing:
"I checked your plot settings, but I need some additional information to calculate irrigation hours accurately. Could you please provide the [missing value(s)]? Once you provide these details, I can complete the calculation for you."

Example response after calculation:
"Based on your plot's irrigation settings, the calculated irrigation hours are [X] hours. 

I used the following settings for this calculation:
- Root width: [value] inches
- Root depth: [value] inches
- Soil retention: [value] mm
- Dripper distance: [value] feet
- Dripper discharge: [value] liters

Would you like to calculate irrigation hours with a different set of values? If yes, please provide the new values you'd like to use."

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी स्प्रे करण्याची सर्वोत्तम वेळ म्हणजे:

1. **सकाळी**: सूर्य उगवण्याच्या आधी किंवा उगवण्याच्या नंतर, जेव्हा तापमान कमी असते.
2. **दुपारी**: तापमान कमी असले तरी, पाऊस झाल्यानंतर काही तासांनी.
3. **संध्याकाळी**: तापमान कमी झाल्यावर, जेव्हा वारा कमी असतो.

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी योग्य स्प्रे परिस्थिती तपासण्यासाठी, मी तुम्हाला स्प्रे परिस्थितीची माहिती देऊ शकतो. तुम्हाला हे करायचे आहे का?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी स्प्रे परिस्थिती खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### Anushka प्लॉट:
- **आज रात्री 10:30**: WORST (पाऊसामुळे परिस्थिती योग्य नाही)
- **आज रात्री 11:30**: WORST
- **उद्या पहाटे 12:30**: WORST
- **उद्या पहाटे 1:30**: MODERATE (पाऊस थांबला आहे, पण वाऱ्याची स्थिती चांगली नाही)
- **उद्या पहाटे 2:30**: WORST
- **उद्या पहाटे 3:30**: WORST
- **उद्या पहाटे 4:30**: WORST

- **उद्या सकाळी 10:30**: WORST
- **उद्या सकाळी 11:30**: WORST
- **उद्या सकाळी 12:30**: WORST

### Manikchaman प्लॉट:
- स्प्रे परिस्थिती तपासण्यात अयशस्वी.

**सारांश**: Anushka प्लॉटसाठी आज रात्री आणि उद्या पहाटे स्प्रे करण्याची स्थिती WORST आहे. तुम्ही उद्या पहाटे 1:30 च्या सुमारास MODERATE स्थितीत स्प्रे करू शकता, पण वाऱ्याची स्थिती चांगली नसल्यामुळे काळजी घ्या. Manikchaman प्लॉटसाठी स्प्रे परिस्थिती तपासता आलेली नाही.

messages.content:
"Phi" (Φ) हा एक गणितीय संज्ञा आहे, जो विशेषतः गणित, भौतिकशास्त्र, आणि इतर विज्ञानांमध्ये वापरला जातो. याचा अर्थ "गोल्डन रेशो" (Golden Ratio) किंवा "गोल्डन संख्या" (Golden Number) आहे, जो 1.6180339887... च्या सुमारे असतो. 

गोल्डन रेशो हा एक विशेष अनुपात आहे जो निसर्गात, आर्किटेक्चरमध्ये, आणि कला मध्ये दिसून येतो. याला "गोल्डन रेशो" म्हणून ओळखले जाते कारण याचा उपयोग अनेक सुंदर रचनांमध्ये केला जातो.

तुम्हाला "Phi" विषयी अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!

messages.content:
The analysis of your grape crop image indicates that the plants are unhealthy. Here are the potential issues identified:

1. **Downy Mildew of Grape** (Likelihood: Possible)
   - **Symptoms**: 
     - Yellowish-green oily spots with a brownish halo on leaves.
     - Irregular brown patches.
     - White to grayish cottony coat under the spots.
     - Can affect shoots, tendrils, and inflorescence.
     - Stunted growth.
   - **Treatment**: 
     - Use an integrated approach with preventive measures and biological treatments if available.
     - Apply protectant fungicides, ensuring proper spraying on the underside of leaves.
     - Copper-based fungicides like Bordeaux mixture and dithiocarbamates can be effective.
     - Post-infection fungicides should be applied immediately after detecting symptoms, such as fosetyl-aluminum and phenylamides.

2. **Thrips** (Likelihood: Very Unlikely)
   - **Symptoms**: 
     - Small silver patches on upper leaves.
     - Yellowing of leaves.
     - Deformation of leaves, flowers, and fruits.
   - **Treatment**: 
     - Consider an integrated approach with preventive measures and biological treatments.
     - Effective contact insecticides include fipronil, imidacloprid, or acetamiprid.

3. **Grape Blister Mite** (Likelihood: Very Unlikely)
   - **Symptoms**: 
     - Blister-like swelling on the upper leaf surface.
     - A layer of short fine hairs (white to pinkish-red) beneath the raised areas.
   - **Treatment**: 
     - Use spirotetramat and ensure adequate foliage for absorption.
     - Wettable sulfur can also be used.

Please take appropriate action based on these findings to protect your grape crop. If you need further assistance or want to discuss treatment options, feel free to ask!
Marathi t sga

messages.content:
तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकाच्या प्रतिमेचे विश्लेषण केले आहे. खालील संभाव्य समस्या आढळल्या आहेत:

1. **डाऊनी मिल्ड्यू (Downy Mildew)** (संभाव्यता: शक्य)
   - **लक्षणे**:
     - पानांवर पिवळसर-हिरव्या तेलकट ठिपक्यांसह तपकिरी वलय.
     - असमान तपकिरी ठिपके.
     - ठिपक्यांच्या खाली पांढरे ते राखाडी कापडासारखे आवरण.
     - कोंब, तंतू आणि फुलांच्या गुच्छांवर परिणाम होऊ शकतो.
     - वाढ थांबवणे.
   - **उपचार**:
     - प्रतिबंधात्मक उपाय आणि जैविक उपचारांचा समावेश असलेल्या एकत्रित दृष्टिकोनाचा वापर करा.
     - पानांच्या खालच्या बाजूस योग्यपणे स्प्रे करून संरक्षणात्मक फंगिसाइड्स लागू करा.
     - कॉपर-आधारित फंगिसाइड्स जसे की बोरडॉक्स मिश्रण आणि डिथिओकार्बामेट प्रभावी असू शकतात.
     - लक्षणे आढळल्यानंतर त्वरित पोस्ट-इन्फेक्शन फंगिसाइड्स लागू करा, जसे की फोसेटिल-अल्यूमिनियम आणि फेनिलामाइड्स.

2. **थ्रिप्स (Thrips)** (संभाव्यता: अत्यंत असंभाव्य)
   - **लक्षणे**:
     - वरच्या पानांवर लहान चांदीच्या ठिपक्यांचा आढळ.
     - पानांचे पिवळे होणे.
     - पान, फुलं आणि फळे विकृत होणे.
   - **उपचार**:
     - प्रतिबंधात्मक उपाय आणि जैविक उपचारांचा समावेश असलेल्या एकत्रित दृष्टिकोनाचा विचार करा.
     - प्रभावी संपर्क कीटकनाशकांमध्ये फिप्रोनिल, इमिडाक्लोप्रिड किंवा अॅसेटामिप्रिडचा समावेश आहे.

3. **द्राक्षांचे ब्लिस्टर माइट (Grape Blister Mite)** (संभाव्यता: अत्यंत असंभाव्य)
   - **लक्षणे**:
     - पानांच्या वरच्या पृष्ठभागावर फुगलेल्या स्वरूपाचे ठिपके.
     - उंचावलेल्या भागांखाली लहान बारीक केसांचा थर (पांढरे ते गुलाबी-लाल).
   - **उपचार**:
     - स्पिरोटेट्रामेटचा वापर करा आणि शोषणासाठी पुरेशी पानांची उपलब्धता सुनिश्चित करा.
     - वेटेबल सल्फर देखील वापरला जाऊ शकतो.

कृपया या आढळलेल्या समस्यांवर योग्य उपाययोजना करा. तुम्हाला आणखी मदतीची आवश्यकता असल्यास किंवा उपचारांच्या पर्यायांवर चर्चा करायची असल्यास, कृपया विचारण्यास अजिबात संकोच करू नका!

messages.content:
**इमामेक्टिन बेंझोएट** एक प्रकारचे कीटकनाशक आहे, जे विशेषतः पान खाणाऱ्या किड्यांवर प्रभावी आहे. हे एक जैविक कीटकनाशक आहे, जे सामान्यतः कीटकांच्या तोंडात प्रवेश करून त्यांना मारते. 

### मुख्य वैशिष्ट्ये:
- **उपयोग**: पान खाणाऱ्या किड्यांवर, जसे की थ्रिप्स, माइट्स, आणि इतर कीटक.
- **क्रिया पद्धत**: कीटकांच्या स्नायूंच्या कार्यावर परिणाम करून त्यांना मारते.
- **फायदे**: कमी प्रमाणात वापरल्यास प्रभावी आणि पर्यावरणास अनुकूल आहे.

### वापर:
- इमामेक्टिन बेंझोएटचा वापर पाण्यात मिसळून स्प्रे करून केला जातो. 
- योग्य प्रमाणात वापरल्यास, हे तुमच्या पिकांचे संरक्षण करण्यात मदत करेल.

जर तुम्हाला याबद्दल अधिक माहिती हवी असेल, तर कृपया सांगा!
He export sathi chalt ka

messages.standalone_en: Is it suitable for export?

messages.content:
होय, इमामेक्टिन बेंझोएट द्राक्षांच्या पिकांसाठी निर्यात करण्यासाठी वापरले जाऊ शकते, परंतु काही गोष्टी लक्षात ठेवाव्यात:

1. **निर्यात नियम**: निर्यात करण्यापूर्वी, तुम्हाला संबंधित देशाच्या कृषी आणि निर्यात नियमांची माहिती असणे आवश्यक आहे. काही देशांमध्ये विशिष्ट कीटकनाशकांच्या वापरावर निर्बंध असू शकतात.

2. **अवशेष चाचणी**: निर्यात केलेल्या उत्पादनांमध्ये कीटकनाशकांचे अवशेष प्रमाणित मर्यादांच्या आत असावे लागतात. त्यामुळे, तुम्हाला उत्पादनाची चाचणी करून घ्यावी लागेल.

3. **प्रमाणपत्रे**: निर्यात प्रक्रियेसाठी आवश्यक असलेल्या सर्व प्रमाणपत्रांची तयारी करा, जसे की फूड सेफ्टी प्रमाणपत्र, गुणवत्ता प्रमाणपत्र इत्यादी.

4. **सुरक्षितता**: इमामेक्टिन बेंझोएटचा वापर करताना सुरक्षितता नियमांचे पालन करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे, जेणेकरून उत्पादन सुरक्षित आणि निर्यातयोग्य असेल.

जर तुम्हाला याबद्दल अधिक माहिती हवी असेल किंवा विशिष्ट प्रश्न असतील, तर कृपया सांगा!

- 400 लिटर पाण्यात या कीटकनाशकांचे मिश्रण करा.

### कारण:
- **उद्देश**: पान खाणाऱ्या किड्यांवर नियंत्रण ठेवणे, विशेषतः "Leaf eating Caterpillar".

कृपया या शिफारसींचा वापर करून आज स्प्रे करा. तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकाचे संरक्षण करण्यासाठी हे महत्त्वाचे आहे. आणखी काही विचारायचे असल्यास, कृपया सांगा!

messages.content:
आर्द्रता कमी असली पाहिजे जेव्हा रोगांचा धोका कमी असतो. सामान्यतः, 40% ते 60% आर्द्रता रोगांच्या वाढीसाठी अनुकूल असते. त्यामुळे, 30% च्या खाली आर्द्रता असणे हे रोगांच्या प्रकोपाला कमी करते. 

तुमच्या पिकांसाठी योग्य आर्द्रता राखणे महत्त्वाचे आहे, विशेषतः द्राक्षांसाठी, जेव्हा तुम्हाला रोगांचा धोका कमी करायचा असेल.

तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकांसाठी, या तापमानाच्या श्रेणीत स्प्रे करणे अधिक प्रभावी ठरेल.

messages.content:
Davni (or downy mildew) in grapes can be effectively managed using the following methods:

1. **Fungicides**: Use systemic fungicides like Metalaxyl or Mefenoxam, which are effective against downy mildew. Apply them as per the recommended dosage and timing.

2. **Cultural Practices**:
   - Ensure proper air circulation around the plants by pruning.
   - Avoid overhead irrigation to reduce humidity.
   - Remove any infected leaves or debris from the vineyard.

3. **Biological Control**: Consider using biological fungicides like Trichoderma or Bacillus subtilis, which can help suppress downy mildew.

4. **Monitoring**: Regularly check for symptoms and apply treatments at the first sign of infection.

Make sure to follow the local agricultural guidelines and consult with a local agronomist for specific recommendations tailored to your region.

ओल्या पानावर कॉपर स्प्रे करणे सामान्यतः शिफारस केलेले नाही, कारण ओले पानांवर स्प्रे केल्यास पाण्यामुळे कॉपरचे प्रभाव कमी होऊ शकते. यामुळे, पानांवर पाण्याचे थेंब असताना कॉपर स्प्रे करणे टाळा. 

सर्वोत्तम परिणामांसाठी, पानं कोरडी असताना कॉपर स्प्रे करणे अधिक प्रभावी ठरते.

messages.content:
काय वापरावे हे तुमच्या पिकांच्या स्थितीवर आणि आवश्यकतेवर अवलंबून आहे. तुम्ही कोणत्या प्रकारच्या समस्यांचा सामना करत आहात? 

1. **पाण्याची आवश्यकता**: जर तुमच्या पिकांना पाण्याची आवश्यकता असेल, तर योग्य वेळेत पाणी द्या.
2. **खते**: जर तुमच्या पिकांना पोषणाची आवश्यकता असेल, तर योग्य खते वापरा.
3. **कीड नियंत्रण**: जर कीड किंवा रोगांचा सामना करावा लागत असेल, तर योग्य कीटकनाशक किंवा रोगनाशक वापरा.

तुमच्या पिकांच्या सध्याच्या अवस्थेवर आधारित अधिक विशिष्ट सल्ला देण्यासाठी, कृपया अधिक माहिती द्या.

messages.content:
ओल्या पानांवर पोंगा स्टेजमध्ये, तुम्ही खालील गोष्टी वापरू शकता:

1. **फोलिअर स्प्रे**: पानांवर फोलिअर स्प्रे करणे अधिक प्रभावी ठरते. यामध्ये पाण्याच्या थेंबांमुळे पानांवर चांगला परिणाम होतो. 
2. **सेंद्रिय कीटकनाशक**: जर तुम्हाला कीड किंवा रोगांचा सामना करावा लागत असेल, तर सेंद्रिय कीटकनाशक वापरा.
3. **पोषणात्मक फोलिअर स्प्रे**: पिकांना आवश्यक पोषण देण्यासाठी फोलिअर स्प्रे वापरा, जसे की नायट्रोजन, फॉस्फरस, आणि पोटॅशियम.

तुमच्या पिकांच्या विशेष गरजांनुसार योग्य उत्पादन निवडणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.

tools:
check_spray_conditions  
Gets the spray condition forecast for the next few hours for the farmer's plots and returns the condition for each hour as GOOD, MODERATE, or WORST, based on deltaT, VPD, and rainfall conditions.
faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: When should we take the petiole and soil samples?
A: It varies crop-wise.

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

Q: which are the insecticide and fungicide to be used for seed treatment
A: Insecticide:  Imidacloprid 600 FS – 5 to 8 ml/kg seeds
Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

messages.content: होय, तुमच्या बागेत थ्रीप्सचा उच्च धोका आहे. 18 एप्रिल 2025 रोजी थ्रीप्सची 100% शक्यता आहे, ज्यामुळे त्याचा धोका "उच्च" आहे. तुम्हाला त्वरित नियंत्रण उपाययोजना करणे आवश्यक आहे.
messages.en: Yes, there is a high risk of thrips in your garden. There is a 100% chance of trips on April 18, 2025, making its risk "high." You need to take immediate control measures.

messages.content: काय स्प्रे घेऊ
messages.en: What spray to take
messages.standalone_question: What spray should I use?
messages.standalone_en: What spray should I use?

faq:
Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

messages.content:
तुमच्या बागेसाठी, आज, 18 एप्रिल 2025 रोजी, तुम्हाला खालील स्प्रे घेण्याची शिफारस केली आहे:

1. **Clothianidin** - 80 मिली
2. **Alphamethrin** - 140 मिली

तुम्हाला 400 लिटर पाण्यात हे मिश्रण करणे आवश्यक आहे. हे स्प्रे उडद्या (फ्ली बीटल) वर प्रभावी आहे.
messages.en:
For your garden, today, April 18, 2025, you are recommended to take the following spray:

1. **Clothianidin** - 80 ml
2. **Alphamethrin** - 140 ml

You need to mix it in 400 litres of water. This spray is effective on flea (flea beetles).

आता काही दिवस थांबा आणि पुन्हा तपासा. जर Fyllo अॅपने पुन्हा स्प्रे करण्याची शिफारस केली, तर त्यानुसार कार्य करा.

You sprayed on April 18, 2025. Right now, you don't need to spray any more for trips. You have already used Clothianidin and Alphamethrin. 

Now wait a few days and check again. If the Fyllo app recommends spraying again, act accordingly.

messages.content:
तुमच्या बागेत सध्या "ब्रेक बड" (Break Bud) या सक्रिय पिकाच्या टप्प्यात आहात, जो 2 व्या आठवड्यात आहे. या टप्प्यात, तुम्हाला खालील मैक्रोन्यूट्रिएंट्सची गरज आहे:

### फर्टिगेशनद्वारे:
1. **12-61-0** - 4 किलोग्राम/एकर
2. **कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट** - 9 किलोग्राम/एकर

### फोलिअर स्प्रे:
- **फेरस सल्फेट** - 800 ग्रॅम/एकर
- **मॅंगनीज सल्फेट** - 800 ग्रॅम/एकर

तुम्ही या फर्टिगेशन आणि फोलिअर स्प्रेची अंमलबजावणी करू शकता. जर तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असेल तर सांगा!
messages.en:
Your garden is currently in the active crop phase of "Break Bud" which is in week 2. At this stage, you need the following macronutrients:

### Via Fertigation:
1. **12-61-0** - 4 kg/acre
2. **Calcium nitrate** - 9 kg/acre

### Foliar Spray:
- **Ferrous sulfate** - 800 g/acre
- **Manganese sulfate** - 800 g/acre

You can implement this fertigation and foliar spray. If you need any more information, let me know!

messages.content: Aj barish ki kya stiti hi
messages.en: What's the rain today?
messages.standalone_question: What is the situation regarding the rain?
messages.standalone_en: What is the situation regarding the rain?

messages.content: Aj barish nahi hui hai. Aaj tak ke data ke anusar, 27 December ko koi barish nahi hui hai. Aapke khet "margad" mein barish ka maamla theek nahi hai.
messages.en: It hasn't rained today. As per today's data, there has been no rain on December 27. The case of rain in your field "Margad" is not good.

messages.content: Aj hogi kya
messages.en: Aj hogi kya
messages.standalone_question: Will it rain today?
messages.standalone_en: Will it rain today?

messages.content:
Aaj, 27 December ko, aapke khet "margad" mein kuch barish hone ki sambhavana hai. 

- 5:30 baje shaam ko 5.5 mm barish hone ki sambhavana hai.
- Iske alawa, raat ko 10:30 baje tak aur 1.7 mm barish hone ki sambhavana hai.

Isliye, aaj barish hone ki sambhavana hai. Aapko paani dene ki zarurat nahi hai agar barish hoti hai.
messages.en:
Today, on December 27, there is a possibility of some rain in your farm "Margad". 

- There is a possibility of 5.5 mm of rain at 5:30 pm in the evening.
- Also, there is a possibility of 10:30 pm tuck and 1.7 mm of rain at night.

Hence, there is a possibility of rain today. You don't need to water if it rains.

messages.content: Dawai spre kare ya nahi
messages.en: Whether to spray the drug or not
messages.standalone_question: Should I apply the medicine or not?
messages.standalone_en: Should I apply the medicine or not?

messages.content: Aaj ke liye aapke khet "margad" mein kisi bhi dawai spray ki koi schedule nahi hai. Isliye, aapko aaj spray karne ki zarurat nahi hai.
messages.en: There is no schedule of any medicine spray in your farm "Margad" for today. So, you don't need to spray today.

messages.content: Par blight ki shikayat hai
messages.en: But there is a complaint of blight
messages.standalone_question: Is there a complaint about blight?
messages.standalone_en: Is there a complaint about blight?

messages.content:
Aapke khet "margad" mein blight ki shikayat ke liye spray karne ka samay hai. Aaj ke liye spray ki sthiti kuch is prakar hai:

- **13:30 baje** se lekar **15:30 baje** tak: **MODERATE** sthiti (spray karne ke liye theek hai)
- **16:30 baje** se lekar **17:30 baje** tak: **IDEAL** sthiti (spray karne ke liye behtareen samay)
- **18:30 baje** se lekar raat tak: **WORST** sthiti (spray nahi karna chahiye)

Isliye, aap **16:30 baje** se **17:30 baje** ke beech spray kar sakte hain, jab sthiti behtareen hai.
messages.en:
It's time to spray for a complaint of blight in your farm "Margad". The status of the spray for today is as follows:

- **13:30 hrs** to **15:30 hrs** Tuck: **Moderate** Position (OK to spray)
- **16:30 hrs** to **17:30 hrs** Tuck: **Ideal** Position (best time to spray)
- **18:30 hrs** to nighttime: **Worst** Position (not to spray)

Therefore, you can spray between **16:30 hrs** to **17:30 hrs**, when the conditions are at its best.

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content:
Agar aap spray karte hain aur baad mein barish hoti hai, to spray ka prabhav kam ho sakta hai. Isliye, aapko spray karne ke liye behtar samay ka intezar karna chahiye.

Aap **16:30 baje** se **17:30 baje** ke beech spray kar sakte hain, jab sthiti behtareen hai. Lekin, agar barish hoti hai to spray ka prabhav kam ho jayega. 

Agar aapko spray karna hai, to is samay ka istemal karein, lekin barish hone par dhyan rakhein.
messages.en:
If you spray and it rains later, the effect of the spray may be reduced. Therefore, you should wait for a better time to spray.

You can spray between **16:30 hrs** to **17:30 hrs**, when conditions are at its best. But, if it rains, the effect of the spray will be reduced. 

If you have to spray, use this time, but take care when it rains.

messages.content:
આપના પ્લોટ "કૈરો 1" માટે હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ મુજબ, તમે નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન (સપ્તાહ 3):
1. **ફર્ટિગેશન (દિવસ 1)**:
   - **યૂરિયા**: 8 કિગ્રા/એકર

2. **ફર્ટિગેશન (દિવસ 4)**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 કિગ્રા/એકર
   - **યૂરિયા**: 4.5 કિગ્રા/એકર
   - **મેગ્નેશિયમ સલ્ફેટ**: 5 કિગ્રા/એકર

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન (સપ્તાહ 4):
1. **ફર્ટિગેશન (દિવસ 1)**:
   - **કેલ્શિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ**: 3.5 કિગ્રા/એકર
   - **યૂરિયા**: 8 કિગ્રા/એકર

2. **ફર્ટિગેશન (દિવસ 4)**:
   - **પોટેશિયમ નાઇટ્રેટ**: 3 કિગ્રા/એકર
   - **એમોનિયમ સલ્ફેટ**: 7 કિગ્રા/એકર

### ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે:
- **19-19-19**: 1.5 કિગ્રા/એકર (ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટે)

ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટે ખાતરનું પ્રમાણ 1% થી વધુ ન હોવું જોઈએ, એટલે કે 500 લિટર પાણીમાં 5 કિગ્રા ખાતર.

આ માહિતી અનુસાર, તમે ફર્ટિગેશન અને ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે કરી શકો છો.
ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે અને ફુવારા થી આપવામાં માપ એજ રહે કે બદલાય

messages.content:
ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે અને ફુવારા દ્વારા ખાતર આપવાના માપમાં થોડો ફરક હોઈ શકે છે. 

### ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે:
- ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટે, સામાન્ય રીતે 1% થી વધુ ન હોવું જોઈએ. એટલે કે, 500 લિટર પાણીમાં 5 કિગ્રા ખાતર.

### ફુવારા (ફર્ટિગેશન):
- ફુવારા દ્વારા આપતા સમયે, ખાતરનું પ્રમાણ પ્લોટના માપ અને પાકની જરૂરિયાત મુજબ હોય છે. જેમ કે, 8 કિગ્રા/એકર યૂરિયા.

### નોટ:
- ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટેનું પ્રમાણ સામાન્ય રીતે ઓછું હોય છે, કારણ કે તે પાન પર સીધું લાગતું હોય છે, જ્યારે ફુવારા દ્વારા જમીનમાં જવા માટે વધુ પ્રમાણમાં ખાતર જરૂરી હોય છે.

તેથી, બંને માટેના માપ અલગ હોઈ શકે છે.
તો મને ફુવારા પ્રમાણે ખાતર નુ માપ આપો19.19.19 નુ

messages.standalone_question: When does my field need water?
messages.standalone_en: When does my field need water?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: In the latest irrigation , sensor didn't drop to 0.
A: 0 to 5 Kpa means soil is fully wet. It need not drop to 0 every time. Moisture less than 5 also means wet conditions. So, need not worry. Also ask to wait for 12 hours after irrigation.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં પાણીની જરૂરિયાત નીચે મુજબ છે:

1. **Main Palot (Kairo)**:
   - **વર્તમાન મોટેર**: 0 kPa (ખેતરમાં પાણી પૂરું છે)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ મોટેર**: 2 (વેટ) - 15 (ડ્રાય)
   - **સૂચન**: હાલમાં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.

2. **Niro (Ghar valo)**:
   - **વર્તમાન મોટેર**: 6 kPa
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ મોટેર**: 2 (વેટ) - 18 (ડ્રાય)
   - **સૂચન**: પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે, કારણ કે મોટેર 18 kPa થી વધુ છે.

3. **nero 1**:
   - **વર્તમાન મોટેર**: 89 kPa (ખેતરમાં પાણીની જરૂર છે)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ મોટેર**: 2 (વેટ) - 18 (ડ્રાય)
   - **સૂચન**: પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે, કારણ કે મોટેર 18 kPa થી વધુ છે.

**સારાંશ**: "Main Palot (Kairo)" માં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, પરંતુ "Niro (Ghar valo)" અને "nero 1" માં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર છે.
મારા ખેતરમાં કયું ખાતર આપવું

faq:
Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17

તમારા ખેતરમાં ખાતર આપવાની સૂચનાઓ નીચે મુજબ છે:

1. **Main Palot (Kairo)**:
   - **વર્તમાન તબક્કો**: વેજેટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
   - **હવે આપવું**:
     - **1મો દિવસ**: 9 કિલોગ્રામ Urea/એકર
     - **4મો દિવસ**: 
       - 4 કિલોગ્રામ 12-61-0/એકર
       - 7.5 કિલોગ્રામ Ammonium Sulphate/એકર
       - 5 કિલોગ્રામ Magnesium Sulphate/એકર
       - (ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80% 1 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા લાગુ કરવું)

2. **Niro (Ghar valo)**:
   - **વર્તમાન તબક્કો**: વેજેટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
   - **હવે આપવું**:
     - **1મો દિવસ**: 8.5 કિલોગ્રામ Urea/એકર
     - **4મો દિવસ**: 
       - 6 કિલોગ્રામ 12-61-0/એકર
       - 6 કિલોગ્રામ Ammonium Sulphate/એકર
       - 5 કિલોગ્રામ Magnesium Sulphate/એકર
       - (ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80% 2.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા લાગુ કરવું)

3. **nero 1**:
   - **વર્તમાન તબક્કો**: વેજેટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
   - **હવે આપવું**:
     - **1મો દિવસ**: 8.5 કિલોગ્રામ Urea/એકર
     - **4મો દિવસ**: 
       - 6 કિલોગ્રામ 12-61-0/એકર
       - 6 કિલોગ્રામ Ammonium Sulphate/એકર
       - 5 કિલોગ્રામ Magnesium Sulphate/એકર
       - (ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80% 2.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા લાગુ કરવું)

**સારાંશ**: ખાતર આપવાની સૂચનાઓ મુજબ, ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરો અને ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડને અન્ય ખાતરો લાગુ કરતા પહેલા લાગુ કરવાનું યાદ રાખો.

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.

get_optimal_soil_moistures  
Retrieves the optimal soil moisture values in kPa or percentage above which to irrigate for all plots. 0 kPa means wet, 200 kPa means dry soil. In percentage: 0% means dry, 100% means wet. In percentage values, irrigate when below the optimum range.
faq:
Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: When should we take the petiole and soil samples?
A: It varies crop-wise.

messages.content:
Plot 1 Kairo ma "Bud initiation" stage chhe, je 7 October 2024 thi sharu thayo chhe. Aapne 2nd week ma chhiye, ane aapne khad ni jaruriyat chhe.

**Aapna fertigation schedule:**

**Aaj ni jaruriyat (2nd week):**
1. **Phosphoric acid**: 15-20 minute pehla biji khad na upyog karta pehla lagadvi.
2. **Fertilizer combinations:**
   - 12-61-0: 5.5 kg/acre
   - 24-24-0: 2.5 kg/acre + Phosphoric acid 80%: 2.5 kg/acre
   - Urea: 1.5 kg/acre + Phosphoric acid 80%: 3.5 kg/acre

**Agla schedule (3rd week):**
- **Start Date**: 17 November 2024
- **Phosphoric acid**: 15-20 minute pehla biji khad na upyog karta pehla lagadvi.
- **Fertilizer combinations**: Same as above.

messages.content:
Aapne "Plot 1 Kairo" ma spray karva ni jaruriyat chhe. Aapne aaj, 17 October 2024 na din spray karvu chhe. Aapne niche aapela rog ne roktham mate spray karvu chhe:

**Spray ni jaruriyat:**
- **Rog:** Anthracnose, Aphids, Mealybug, Thrips

**Spray ni samagri:**
1. **Combination 1:**
   - Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25% - 0.5 mL
   - Cyantraniliprole 10.26% OD - 1.8 mL

2. **Combination 2:**
   - Azoxystrobin 11% + Tebuconazole 18.3% ww SC - 0.8 mL
   - Thiamethoxam - 0.5 g

3. **Combination 3:**
   - Imidacloprid 17.8 SL - 0.5 mL
   - Thiophanate methyl - 2.5 g

Aapne aaj spray karva ni jaruriyat chhe. Aapne koi vishesh madad joiye chhe?

messages.content: What is reddish spot
messages.en: What is reddish spot
messages.standalone_question: What does a reddish spot on a leaf indicate?
messages.standalone_en: What does a reddish spot on a leaf indicate?

messages.content:
A reddish spot on a plant leaf can indicate several potential issues, including:

1. **Pest Damage**: Certain pests, like spider mites or aphids, can cause discoloration and spots on leaves.
2. **Fungal Infections**: Some fungal diseases may present as reddish or brown spots, indicating infection.
3. **Nutrient Deficiency**: A lack of essential nutrients, particularly potassium or magnesium, can lead to discoloration.
4. **Environmental Stress**: Factors such as excessive sunlight, heat, or water stress can also cause leaf discoloration.

It's important to monitor the plant closely and consider further investigation or treatment based on the specific symptoms observed. If you notice additional symptoms or patterns, please share for more tailored advice.
messages.en:
A reddish spot on a plant leaf can indicate several potential issues, including:

1. **Pest Damage**: Certain pests, like spider mites or aphids, can cause discoloration and spots on leaves.
2. **Fungal Infections**: Some fungal diseases may present as reddish or brown spots, indicating infection.
3. **Nutrient Deficiency**: A lack of essential nutrients, particularly potassium or magnesium, can lead to discoloration.
4. **Environmental Stress**: Factors such as excessive sunlight, heat, or water stress can also cause leaf discoloration.

It's important to monitor the plant closely and consider further investigation or treatment based on the specific symptoms observed. If you notice additional symptoms or patterns, please share for more tailored advice.

messages.content: Can you suggest the treatment

messages.standalone_question: What treatment options are available for addressing reddish spots on plant leaves?
messages.standalone_en: What treatment options are available for addressing reddish spots on plant leaves?

messages.content:
For seed treatment in cotton, you can use the following:

### Insecticide:
- **Imidacloprid 600 FS**: Apply 5 to 8 ml per kg of seeds.

### Fungicide:
- **Thiram**: Apply 2 to 3 gm per kg of seeds.

### Benefits of Seed Treatment:
- Prevents the spread of plant diseases and pests.
- Protects seeds from rot and seedling blights.
- Improves seed germination rates.
- Provides protection from storage insects.
- Controls soil insects.

### Important Diseases to Watch For:
- **Collar Rot**
- **Damping Off**
- **Seedling Blight**

### Control Measures for Seedling Diseases:
- Drench or spray seedlings with **Carbendazim** at a rate of 2.5 g per liter of water.

Make sure to follow the recommended dosages and safety precautions while applying these treatments. If you have any specific concerns or conditions in your field, feel free to ask!

messages.content: Can we apply carbendazim with irrigation
messages.en: Can we apply carbendazim with irrigation
messages.standalone_question: Can Carbendazim be applied through irrigation?
messages.standalone_en: Can Carbendazim be applied through irrigation?

faq:
Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

messages.content:
Yes, Carbendazim can be applied through irrigation as a drench or soil application. This method allows for effective distribution of the fungicide to the root zone, helping to control soil-borne diseases.

### Application Tips:
- **Dilution**: Mix Carbendazim with water according to the recommended dosage.
- **Timing**: Apply it during irrigation when the soil is moist to enhance absorption.
- **Follow-Up**: Ensure that the irrigation system is functioning properly to deliver the fungicide evenly.

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions for dosage and application methods to ensure effectiveness and safety. If you have any specific conditions or concerns, feel free to ask!

messages.content: थेराम काय आहे
messages.en: What is Theram
messages.standalone_question: What is thiram?
messages.standalone_en: What is thiram?

messages.content:
थिराम (Thiram) एक प्रकारचा फंगीसाइड आहे जो मुख्यतः पिकांच्या बियाण्यांच्या उपचारासाठी वापरला जातो. याचा उपयोग बियाण्यांवर विविध फंगसजन्य रोगांपासून संरक्षण करण्यासाठी केला जातो. थिराम बियाण्यांच्या उगवणीत सुधारणा करतो आणि त्यांना अधिक मजबूत बनवतो.

**उपयोग:**
- बियाण्यांच्या उपचारासाठी: थिराम 2 ते 3 ग्रॅम प्रति किलो बियाणे प्रमाणात वापरला जातो.
- विविध पिकांमध्ये फंगसजन्य रोगांवर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी.

कृपया थिरामचा वापर करताना योग्य प्रमाण आणि पद्धतींचा विचार करा. अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया सांगा.
messages.en:
Thiram is a type of fungicide that is mainly used to treat crop seeds. It is used to protect the seeds from various fungal diseases. Thiram improves the germination of seeds and makes them stronger.

**Use:**
For seed treatment: Thiram is used in 2 to 3 grams per kilogram of seed.
- To control fungal diseases in various crops.

Please consider the appropriate standards and methods when using Thiram. If you need more information, please let me know.

faq:
Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

messages.content:
तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी पाण्याची आवश्यकतांची गणना केली आहे. तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी पाण्याची आवश्यकतांची वेळ 1.78 तास आहे.

मी खालील सेटिंग्ज वापरल्या:
- रूट रुंदी: 20 इंच
- रूट खोली: 7 इंच
- मातीची धारणा: 200 मिमी
- ड्रिपर अंतर: 1.5 मिमी
- ड्रिपर डिस्चार्ज: 1.6 लिटर

तुम्हाला वेगळ्या सेटिंग्जसह पाण्याची वेळ गणना करायची आहे का? जर होय, तर कृपया नवीन मूल्ये द्या.

I used the following settings:
- Route width: 20 inches
- Root depth: 7 inches
- Soil retention: 200 mm
- Dripper distance: 1.5 mm
- Draper discharge: 1.6 liters

Do you want to calculate water time with different settings? If yes, please give new values.
