messages.content:
આજે અથવા આગામી દિવસોમાં લીફ માઇનર માટે કોઈ છંટકાવની શેડ્યૂલ નથી. 

પરંતુ, લીફ માઇનર માટે સામાન્ય રીતે ઉપયોગમાં લેવાતા કીટનાશકમાં **ચ્લોરપિરિફોસ** અથવા **થિયામેથોક્સામ**નો સમાવેશ થાય છે. 

**છંટકાવ માટેની ભલામણ:**
- **ચ્લોરપિરિફોસ** @ 5 મીલીલિટર/લિટર પાણી
- **થિયામેથોક્સામ** @ 0.5 ગ્રામ/લિટર પાણી

આ દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે લીફ માઇનર પર નિયંત્રણ મેળવી શકો છો.
messages.en:
There is no spraying schedule for leaf miners today or in the coming days. 

But, the most commonly used pesticides for leaf miners include **chlorpirifos** or **thiamathoxam**. 

**Recommendation for spraying:**
- **Chlorpirifos** @ 5 ml/litre water
- **Thiamethoxam** @ 0.5 g/litre of water

By using these drugs, you can gain control over the leaf miner.

messages.content: केळी मध्ये तणनाशक मारले चालेलका
messages.en: Can weedicides be killed in bananas?
messages.standalone_question: Is it permissible to use pesticides on bananas?
messages.standalone_en: Is it permissible to use pesticides on bananas?

messages.content:
केळीच्या पिकात तणनाशक वापरणे योग्य आहे, परंतु त्यासाठी काही गोष्टींचा विचार करावा लागतो. तणनाशकाची निवड करताना त्याची पिकाशी सुसंगतता आणि वापरण्याची योग्य पद्धत यांचा विचार करा. 

तणनाशक वापरण्यापूर्वी, तुमच्या पिकाच्या स्थितीचा आणि तणांच्या प्रकाराचा विचार करा. तुम्हाला अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया Fyllo च्या CRM नंबरवर संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
It is advisable to use herbicides in banana crops, but there are a few things to consider. When choosing a herbicide, consider its consistency with the crop and the right method of use. 

Before using a herbicide, consider the condition of your crop and the type of weed. If you would like more information, please contact Fyllo's CRM number.

messages.content: Sensor work properly?
messages.en: Sensor work properly?
messages.standalone_question: Is the sensor functioning properly?
messages.standalone_en: Is the sensor functioning properly?

faq:
Q: How do I know if my soil  moisture sensor is working fine ?
A: The only way to know is if after irrigation the sensor is dropping below 5 kpa and increasing continuously unless next irrigation is done. You can try putting water on the sensor and it should drop. Also, there should not be any fluctuations in the soil moisture data and the pressure kpa should always be increasing. Also, a soil moisture reading of 0 kPa is perfectly fine, meaning wet soil, but a reading of 200 kPa could mean fault. If the soil moisture sensor reading is consistently at 0 from few 48 hours, then it could be anamolous (use live and historical hourly soil moisture data (use tool) to validate).

messages.content:
The sensor in **Plot no 2 Sudhakar** is showing a soil moisture reading of **0 kPa**, which indicates wet soil. This can be normal, especially if the sensor was recently installed or if the crop is in an early stage. 

However, if the sensor has been showing 0 kPa for an extended period, it may be worth checking the following:

1. **Installation**: Ensure the sensor is properly installed and not surrounded by excess water.
2. **Irrigation**: If you have irrigated recently, it usually takes about 12 hours for the moisture to reach the sensor. If it remains at 0 kPa after that, there might be an issue.
3. **Local Conditions**: Check for any landscaping or slope issues that might be affecting water drainage around the sensor.

Would you like to create an issue ticket for further investigation?

faq:
Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content: મારા ખેતરમાં કયું ખાતર આપવા જોવું છે
messages.en: What fertilizer to look for in my farm
messages.standalone_question: What fertilizer should I consider using in my field?
messages.standalone_en: What fertilizer should I consider using in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

Q: Why should I consider soil, leaf, or petiole testing?
A: Soil, leaf, and petiole testing are crucial for effective plant health management. These tests provide specific data about your crop's nutrient needs, allowing for more precise fertilizer application. This can lead to higher productivity with optimized input use, potentially reducing costs and environmental impact.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં હાલ "મસકમેલન" પાકની "કૃષિ સ્થાપના" તબક્કામાં 2મા સપ્તાહમાં છો. આજના દિવસે, 12 માર્ચ 2025, નીચેના ખાતરો આપવાની ભલામણ છે:

### હાલની ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
- **હમિક એસિડ**: 1 લિટર/એકર

> નોંધ: ફર્ટિગેશન પહેલાં ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ અલગથી 15-20 મિનિટ પહેલા લાગુ કરવું જોઈએ.

### આગામી ફર્ટિગેશન શેડ્યૂલ:
- **તબક્કો**: વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ
  - **તારીખ**: 26 માર્ચ 2025
  - **ખાતરો**:
    - 12-61-0: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - અથવા
    - 24-24-0: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 2 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
    - અથવા
    - યુરિયા: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર + ફોસ્ફોરિક એસિડ 80%: 3 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને, તમે યોગ્ય રીતે ખાતર આપી શકો છો.
messages.en:
You are currently in your 2nd week in the "agricultural establishment" phase of the "Muscamelan" crop on your farm. On this day, 12th March 2025, it is recommended to give the following fertilizers:

### Current Fertigation Schedule:
* **Hamik acid**: 1 litre/acre

> Note: Phosphoric acid should be applied 15-20 minutes before separation before fertigation.

### Upcoming Fertigation Schedule:
- **Phase**: Vegetable Growth
  * **Date**: 26 March 2025
  - **Fertilizers**:
    12-61-0: 3 kg/acre
    -or
    24-24-0: 3 kg/acre + phosphoric acid 80%: 2 kg/acre
    -or
    Urea: 1.5 kg/acre + phosphoric acid 80%: 3 kg/acre

Using this information, you can properly compost.

messages.content:
बाविस्टीन, रोगर आणि Fe (आयरन) यांचा एकत्रित वापर करणे योग्य आहे, परंतु याचा वापर करताना काही गोष्टी लक्षात ठेवाव्यात:

1. **पिकाची अवस्था**: तुम्ही सध्या "फ्लॉवरिंग" अवस्थेत आहात, त्यामुळे फुलांच्या विकासावर लक्ष केंद्रित करणे आवश्यक आहे.
2. **संवेदनशीलता**: काही पिके या रसायनांना संवेदनशील असू शकतात, त्यामुळे वापराच्या प्रमाणाची काळजी घ्या.
3. **संपूर्ण माहिती**: प्रत्येक रसायनाच्या वापराच्या सूचना वाचून त्यानुसार वापरा.

तुमच्या पिकासाठी योग्य प्रमाण आणि पद्धतीसाठी स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घेणे चांगले.
messages.en:
It is appropriate to use Bavistin, Roger, and Fe (iron) together, but there are a few things to keep in mind when using it:

1. **Crop stage**: You are currently in a "flowering" state, so it is important to focus on flower development.
2. **Sensitivity**: Some crops may be sensitive to these chemicals, so be careful about the amount of use.
3. **Full information**: Read and use instructions for the use of each chemical accordingly.

It is best to consult a local agricultural expert for the right quantity and method for your crop.

Use these proportions as per your crop requirements.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

It is important to monitor your crop regularly and treat it as needed. If the attack is severe, it's best to consult a local agricultural expert.

messages.standalone_question: What is the application of April ethepon?
messages.standalone_en: What is the application of April ethepon?

messages.content:
Ethephon is a plant growth regulator commonly used in grape cultivation to promote ripening and enhance fruit quality. For your grape crop in the "Beginning Veraison" stage, the application of ethephon is typically done when the berries are at the appropriate size and color change is starting to occur.

Since you are currently in the "Beginning Veraison" stage, you can consider applying ethephon in early April, around the time when the berries are beginning to change color. 

Make sure to follow the recommended dosage and application method as per the product guidelines. Additionally, monitor weather conditions to avoid applying it before rain, which could wash away the treatment. 

If you need specific application dates or further assistance, please let me know!

messages.content:
Drip irrigation ke zariye fungicide spray karne ke liye, aapko kuch specific fungicides ka istemal karna chahiye jo ki drip system ke liye suitable hain. Yeh kuch common fungicides hain jo aap drip irrigation ke zariye istemal kar sakte hain:

1. **Copper-based fungicides**: Yeh fungal diseases ke liye effective hain aur drip irrigation ke zariye easily apply kiye ja sakte hain.
2. **Triazoles**: Yeh systemic fungicides hain jo plant ke andar absorb hote hain aur fungal infections se bachate hain.
3. **Bacillus subtilis**: Yeh ek biological fungicide hai jo soil mein beneficial bacteria ko promote karta hai aur fungal diseases se protection deta hai.

Aapko yeh ensure karna hoga ki fungicide ka formulation drip irrigation ke liye compatible ho. Iske liye, product label par di gayi instructions ko dhyan se padhein. Agar aapko specific fungicide ki zarurat hai, toh mujhe aapke crop aur disease ke baare mein bataiye, main aapko aur specific recommendations de sakta hoon.
messages.en:
To spray fungicides through drip irrigation, you should use certain specific fungicides that are suitable for drip systems. Here are some common fungicides that you can use through drip irrigation:

1. Copper-Based Fungicides: It is effective against fungal diseases and can be applied through drip irrigation.
2. Triazoles: These are systemic fungicides that are absorbed inside the plant and protect against fungal infections.
3. Bacillus subatilis: It is a biological fungicide that promotes beneficial bacteria in soil and provides protection against fungal diseases.

You need to ensure that the formulation of the fungicide is compatible with drip irrigation. For this, read the instructions on the product label carefully. If you need a specific fungicide, tell me about your crop and disease, I can give you a more specific recommendation.

messages.content:
Here are the pest and disease predictions for your pomegranate plot (6a) from February 1 to February 11, 2025:

### Pest Predictions:
- **February 11, 2025**:
  - **Mealybug**: 59.5% (Medium Risk)
  - **Aphids**: 54.0% (Medium Risk)
  - **White Fly**: 62.4% (Medium Risk)
  - **Thrips**: 44.3% (Low Risk)
  - **Fruit Borer**: 16.8% (NIL Risk)
  - **Flat Mites**: 10.3% (NIL Risk)
  - **Fruit Sucking Moth**: 49.7% (Low Risk)

### Disease Predictions:
- **February 11, 2025**:
  - **Bacterial Blight**: 100% (High Risk)
  - **Cercospora**: 84.9% (High Risk)
  - **Anthracnose**: 65.8% (Medium Risk)

### Recommendations:
1. **For Pests**: Monitor the levels of mealybug, aphids, and white fly closely. Consider applying appropriate insecticides if their populations increase.
2. **For Diseases**: The high risk of bacterial blight and cercospora indicates that immediate action is needed. Apply suitable fungicides to control these diseases.

If you need specific product recommendations or further assistance, feel free to ask!

### Pest and Disease Spray Schedule for February 11, 2025:
Currently, there are no specific pest or disease spray recommendations for today.

### Fertigation Schedule for Pomegranate (Plot: 6a):
- **Current Stage**: Mid stage fruit growth (Started on January 12, 2025)
- **Current Week Schedule**: No fertigation needed.

#### Next Fertigation Schedule (Starting February 18, 2025):
1. **Stage**: Late stage fruit growth and Harvest
   - **Fertigation Method**:
     - **Combination 1**:
       - Potassium Nitrate: 4 kg/acre
       - Urea: 1 kg/acre
       - Calcium Nitrate: 2.5 kg/acre (Apply separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers)
     - **Combination 2**:
       - Urea: 2 kg/acre
       - Sulfate of Potash: 3.5 kg/acre
       - Calcium Nitrate: 2.5 kg/acre
   - **Foliar Method**:
     - Mono Potassium Phosphate: 3 kg/acre (Concentration should not exceed 1% in foliar spray)

If you have any further questions or need assistance with specific products, feel free to ask!

- Provides protection from storage insects
- Controls the soil insects

messages.content: एकत्र मिश्रण चालेल का
messages.en: Will the mixed mix work?
messages.standalone_question: Can these two substances be mixed together?
messages.standalone_en: Can these two substances be mixed together?

messages.content:
होय, थायमोक्झाम, लॅमडासिलोथ्रिन आणि नॅटिवो फंगिसाइड यांचे एकत्र मिश्रण वापरणे चालेल. मात्र, मिश्रण करण्यापूर्वी खालील गोष्टी लक्षात ठेवा:

1. **प्रमाण**: प्रत्येक औषधाचे योग्य प्रमाण वापरा.
2. **पाण्यात विरघळणे**: सर्व औषधे पाण्यात चांगले विरघळतात का ते तपासा.
3. **परीक्षण**: मोठ्या प्रमाणात वापरण्यापूर्वी, कमी प्रमाणात चाचणी करा.
4. **सुरक्षा**: वापरताना योग्य सुरक्षा साधने वापरा.

यामुळे तुम्हाला अधिक प्रभावी परिणाम मिळतील.
messages.en:
Yes, a combination of thymoxam, lamadasilothrine, and nativo fungicide would work. However, keep the following in mind before mixing:

1. **Ratio**: Use the right amount of each drug.
2. **Dissolving in water**: Check that all medications dissolve well in water.
3. **Test**: Before using it in large quantities, test in small quantities.
4. **Security**: Use appropriate safety equipment when using.

This will give you more effective results.

messages.content: चिलेटेड झिंक सल्फेट म्हणजे झिंक (Zn) च्या आयनांना चिलेटिंग एजंटसह बांधलेले असते, ज्यामुळे ते मातीमध्ये अधिक स्थिर आणि उपलब्ध राहतात. हे झिंकच्या शोषणास मदत करते, विशेषतः मातीमध्ये झिंकची कमी असलेल्या ठिकाणी. चिलेटेड झिंक सल्फेट वापरल्याने पिकांना झिंकची अधिक प्रभावीपणे उपलब्धता होते, ज्यामुळे त्यांची वाढ आणि उत्पादन क्षमता सुधारते.
messages.en: Chilled zinc sulfate means that the ions of zinc (Zn) are bound with chillating agents, making them more stable and available in the soil. This helps in the absorption of zinc, especially in places where there is a zinc deficiency in the soil. Using chilled zinc sulfate makes crops more effectively available zinc, which improves their growth and productivity.

messages.content: Are potassium Schoenite and pms same
messages.en: Are potassium Schoenite and pms same
messages.standalone_question: Are potassium Schoenite and PMS the same?
messages.standalone_en: Are potassium Schoenite and PMS the same?

messages.content:
Potassium Schoenite and PMS (Potassium Magnesium Sulfate) are not the same, but they are related. 

- **Potassium Schoenite** is a mineral that contains potassium, magnesium, and sulfate, often used as a fertilizer. Its chemical formula is K2SO4·MgSO4·6H2O.

- **PMS (Potassium Magnesium Sulfate)**, also known as langbeinite, is a fertilizer that provides potassium, magnesium, and sulfur. Its chemical formula is K2Mg2(SO4)3·6H2O.

Both provide essential nutrients for plants, but they have different compositions and properties.
messages.en:
Potassium Schoenite and PMS (Potassium Magnesium Sulfate) are not the same, but they are related. 

- **Potassium Schoenite** is a mineral that contains potassium, magnesium, and sulfate, often used as a fertilizer. Its chemical formula is K2SO4· MgSO4·6H2O.

- **PMS (Potassium Magnesium Sulfate)**, also known as langbeinite, is a fertilizer that provides potassium, magnesium, and sulfur. Its chemical formula is K2Mg2(SO4)3·6H2O.

Both provide essential nutrients for plants, but they have different compositions and properties.

messages.content: Yes, you can mix Coconut Oil Cake (COC) and Acetamiprid for spray. COC acts as a natural pesticide and can enhance the effectiveness of Acetamiprid, which is a systemic insecticide. However, it's essential to follow the recommended dosages and guidelines for both products to ensure safety and effectiveness. Always conduct a small test spray on a few plants before applying it to the entire crop to check for any adverse reactions.

faq:
Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

messages.content:
Mixing Copper Oxychloride and Acetamiprid is generally not recommended. Copper Oxychloride is a fungicide, while Acetamiprid is an insecticide. Mixing them can lead to reduced effectiveness of one or both products and may cause phytotoxicity (harm to the plants).

It's best to apply them separately, allowing sufficient time between applications to avoid any potential negative interactions. Always follow the manufacturer's guidelines for each product.
messages.en:
Mixing Copper Oxychloride and Acetamiprid is generally not recommended. Copper Oxychloride is a fungicide, while Acetamiprid is an insecticide. Mixing them can lead to reduced effectiveness of one or both products and may cause phytotoxicity (harm to the plants).

It's best to apply them separately, allowing sufficient time between applications to avoid any potential negative interactions. Always follow the manufacturer's guidelines for each product.

messages.content: Acetamaprid uses
messages.en: Acetamaprid uses
messages.standalone_question: What are the uses of Acetamiprid?
messages.standalone_en: What are the uses of Acetamiprid?

messages.content:
Acetamiprid is a systemic insecticide belonging to the neonicotinoid class. It is primarily used for controlling a variety of pests in agriculture. Here are some common uses of Acetamiprid:

1. **Pest Control**: Effective against aphids, whiteflies, thrips, leafhoppers, and other sucking pests on various crops.

2. **Crops**: Used on a wide range of crops, including vegetables, fruits, and ornamental plants.

3. **Seed Treatment**: Can be applied as a seed treatment to protect seedlings from early pest infestations.

4. **Foliar Application**: Sprayed on the foliage to control existing pest populations.

5. **Soil Application**: Sometimes used in soil applications to manage soil-borne pests.

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions for dosage and application methods to ensure safety and effectiveness.

messages.content: Is it possible to mix copper oxy chloride and buprofezin
messages.en: Is it possible to mix copper oxy chloride and buprofezin
messages.standalone_question: Can Copper Oxychloride be mixed with Buprofezin?
messages.standalone_en: Can Copper Oxychloride be mixed with Buprofezin?

messages.content:
Yes, it is generally possible to mix Copper Oxychloride and Buprofezin. Copper Oxychloride is a fungicide, while Buprofezin is an insect growth regulator used to control certain pests. 

However, it's essential to conduct a compatibility test before mixing them for the first time, as some combinations may lead to reduced effectiveness or phytotoxicity. Always follow the manufacturer's guidelines for both products and ensure proper application techniques.

messages.content_transliterated: batakano vavetar karya pachi kai tarikhe bataka jaminamanthi bahar kadhava

messages.content:
બટાકા સામાન્ય રીતે 70-90 દિવસ પછી કાપવા માટે તૈયાર થાય છે. જો તમે 2024-11-07 ના રોજ વાવેતર કર્યું હોય, તો બટાકા જમીનમાંથી બહાર કાઢવા માટેની યોગ્ય તારીખ 2025-01-15 થી 2025-01-30 વચ્ચે હોઈ શકે છે. 

તમે તમારા પાકના વિકાસને ધ્યાનમાં રાખીને ચોક્કસ તારીખ નક્કી કરી શકો છો.
messages.en:
Potatoes are usually ready to be harvested after 70-90 days. If you have sown on 2024-11-07, the proper date for removing potatoes from the ground may be between 2025-01-15 to 2025-01-30. 

You can fix a specific date keeping in mind the development of your crop.

messages.content:
તમારા બટાકાના પાકની હાલની સ્થિતિ મુજબ, "Dela Valu" અને "Patsala" પ્લોટમાં બટાકા હાલ "Tuber development" તબક્કામાં છે, જે 2025-01-03 અને 2025-01-20 થી શરૂ થયો છે. 

"કેહજાડા વાલુ" પ્લોટમાં બટાકા "Maturity and Harvest" તબક્કામાં છે, જે 2025-01-05 થી શરૂ થયો છે. 

તેથી, બટાકા જમીનમાં કમ્પલેટ બેસી ગયા છે અને હવે તેઓ વિકાસના તબક્કામાં છે.
messages.en:
According to the current status of your potato crop, potatoes in the "Dela Valu" and "Patsala" plots are currently in the "Tuber Development" stage, starting from 2025-01-03 and 2025-01-20. 

Potatoes in the "Kehzada Vaalu" plot are in the "Maturity and Harvest" stage, starting from 2025-01-05. 

So, the potatoes have settled in the ground and now they are in the development stage.

messages.content:
તમારા બટાકાના પાકમાં "Dela Valu", "Patsala", અને "Khejada Valu" પ્લોટમાં "Late Blight" અને "Early Blight" રોગોની મધ્યમ જોખમ સ્તર છે. 

### સારવાર માટેની ભલામણ:
1. **Late Blight**:
   - **Iprovalicarb + Propineb**: 1.5 ગ્રામ
   - **Ametoctradin + Dimethomorph**: 2 મિલી
   - **Metiram 55% + Pyraclostrobin 5%**: 2 ગ્રામ

2. **Early Blight**:
   - **Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25%**: 0.6 ગ્રામ
   - **Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC**: 1 મિલી
   - **Difenoconazole**: 0.8 મિલી

### સ્પ્રે કરવાની તારીખ:
- **2025-01-20**: આ તારીખે ઉપરોક્ત દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરો.

આ દવાઓને foliar application દ્વારા લાગુ કરો.
messages.en:
Plots "Dela Valu", "Patsala", and "Khejada Valu" in your potato crop have moderate risk levels for "Late Blight" and "Early Blight" diseases. 

### Recommendations for treatment:
1. **Late Blight**:
   - **Iprovalicarb + Propineb**: 1.5 g
   - **Ametoctradin + Dimethomorph**: 2 ml
   - **Metiram 55% + Pyraclostrobin 5%**: 2 g

2. **Early Blight**:
   - **Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25%**: 0.6 g
   - **Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC**: 1 milli
   **Difenoconazole**: 0.8 ml

### Date of spraying:
* **2025-01-20**: Use the above medicines on this date.

Apply these drugs through the foliar application.

messages.content:
Manik chaman plot साठी 78 दिवसांपूर्वी (2025-01-15) खालील स्प्रे शिफारसी आहेत:

1. **तारीख:** 2025-01-15
   - **उद्देश:** पावडरी मिल्ड्यू, थ्रिप्स
   - **पाण्याचे प्रमाण:** 400 लिटर
   - **स्प्रे संयोजन:** 
     - 320 ग्रॅम Pseudomonas
     - 320 ग्रॅम Bacillus subtilis

2. **तारीख:** 2025-01-07
   - **उद्देश:** मीलीबग, थ्रिप्स, पान खाणारी किडा
   - **पाण्याचे प्रमाण:** 400 लिटर
   - **स्प्रे संयोजन:** 
     - 280 मिली Abamectin
     - 600 ग्रॅम Metarhizium anisopilae

3. **तारीख:** 2024-12-27
   - **उद्देश:** पावडरी मिल्ड्यू
   - **पाण्याचे प्रमाण:** 400 लिटर
   - **स्प्रे संयोजन:** 
     - 100 मिली Metrafenone
     - किंवा 200 मिली Difenoconazole

4. **तारीख:** 2024-12-22
   - **उद्देश:** थ्रिप्स, माइट्स, पावडरी मिल्ड्यू, पान खाणारी किडा
   - **पाण्याचे प्रमाण:** 400 लिटर
   - **स्प्रे संयोजन:** 
     - 200 मिली Difenoconazole आणि 100 ग्रॅम Emamectin Benzoate
     - किंवा 100 मिली Metrafenone आणि 100 ग्रॅम Emamectin Benzoate

5. **तारीख:** 2024-12-18
   - **उद्देश:** पावडरी मिल्ड्यू
   - **पाण्याचे प्रमाण:** 400 लिटर
   - **स्प्रे संयोजन:** 
     - 100 मिली Fluopyram आणि 100 मिली Tebuconazole

6. **तारीख:** 2024-12-13
   - **उद्देश:** मीलीबग, लाल स्पायडर माइट्स
   - **पाण्याचे प्रमाण:** 400 लिटर
   - **स्प्रे संयोजन:** 
     - 400 मिली Spirotetramat

7. **तारीख:** 2024-12-07
   - **उद्देश:** डाउन मिल्ड्यू, पावडरी मिल्ड्यू
   - **पाण्याचे प्रमाण:** 400 लिटर
   - **स्प्रे संयोजन:** 
     - 800 ग्रॅम fosetyl-a आणि 800 ग्रॅम Propineb

या शिफारसींनुसार योग्य स्प्रे करा.
messages.en:
The following spray recommendations for Manik chaman plot 78 days ago (2025-01-15) are:

1. **Date:** 2025-01-15
   - **Purpose:** Powdery mildew, thrips
   - **Water content:** 400 liters
   - **Spray combination:** 
     - 320 g Pseudomonas
     - 320 g Bacillus subtilis

2. **Date:** 2025-01-07
   - **Purpose:** Millibugs, thrips, leaf-eating insects
   - **Water content:** 400 liters
   - **Spray combination:** 
     - 280 ml Abamectin
     - 600 grams Metarhizium anisopilae

3. **Date:** 2024-12-27
   - **Purpose:** Powdery Mildew
   - **Water content:** 400 liters
   - **Spray combination:** 
     - 100 ml Metrafenone
     - or 200 ml Difenoconazole

4. **Date:** 2024-12-22
   - **Purpose:** Thrips, mites, powdery mildew, leaf-eating insect
   - **Water content:** 400 liters
   - **Spray combination:** 
     200 ml Difenoconazole and 100 g Emamectin Benzoate
     or 100 ml Metrafenone and 100 g Emamectin Benzoate

5. **Date:** 2024-12-18
   - **Purpose:** Powdery Mildew
   - **Water content:** 400 liters
   - **Spray combination:** 
     - 100 ml Fluopyram and 100 ml Tebuconazole

6. **Date:** 2024-12-13
   - **Purpose:** Millibug, red Spider mites
   - **Water content:** 400 liters
   - **Spray combination:** 
     - 400 ml Spirotetramat

7. **Date:** 2024-12-07
   - **Purpose:** Down mildew, powdery mildew
   - **Water content:** 400 liters
   - **Spray combination:** 
     800 g fosetyl-a and 800 g propineb

Spray properly according to these recommendations.

messages.content: Is Blitox compitable with sulphur
messages.en: Is Blitox compitable with sulphur
messages.standalone_question: Is Blitox compatible with sulfur?
messages.standalone_en: Is Blitox compatible with sulfur?

messages.content: Blitox (Copper-based fungicide) is generally not compatible with sulfur. Mixing these two can lead to phytotoxicity (plant damage) and reduce the effectiveness of both products. It's advisable to use them separately and follow the manufacturer's guidelines for application. Always conduct a small test before applying any mixture on a larger scale.

It's advisable to use them separately and follow the manufacturer's guidelines for application. Always conduct a small test before applying any mixture on a larger scale.

messages.standalone_question: Is Bordeaux mixture compatible with stickers and spreaders?
messages.standalone_en: Is Bordeaux mixture compatible with stickers and spreaders?

messages.content: Yes, Bordeaux mixture (a combination of copper sulfate and lime) is generally compatible with stickers and spreaders. Adding a sticker can help the mixture adhere better to the plant surfaces, while a spreader can improve the coverage of the application. However, it's always best to conduct a small test before applying on a larger scale to ensure there are no adverse reactions.

છંટકાવ માટેની સૂચનાઓ નીચે મુજબ છે:

### Anilbhai Pukhraj Nero 5
- **તારીખ:** 14 જાન્યુઆરી 2025
- **પેસ્ટ:** Early blight
  - **સૂચવાયેલ દવા:** 
    - Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC (1 mL)
    - Chlorothalonil (2 g)
    - Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP (2 g)
- **પેસ્ટ:** Aphids, Thrips, Whitefly
  - **સૂચવાયેલ દવા:** 
    - Tolfenpyrad 15% EC (1.25 mL)
    - spirotetramat11Imidacloprid11 (0.8 mL)
    - Pyrifluquinazon 20% WG (1 g)
    - Broflanilide 300G/L SC (0.4 mL)

### Sitaram Sukhyati Nero 2
- **તારીખ:** 14 જાન્યુઆરી 2025
- **પેસ્ટ:** Early blight
  - **સૂચવાયેલ દવા:** 
    - Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC (1 mL)
    - Chlorothalonil (2 g)
    - Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP (2 g)
- **પેસ્ટ:** Aphids, Thrips, Whitefly
  - **સૂચવાયેલ દવા:** 
    - Tolfenpyrad 15% EC (1.25 mL)
    - spirotetramat11Imidacloprid11 (0.8 mL)
    - Pyrifluquinazon 20% WG (1 g)
    - Broflanilide 300G/L SC (0.4 mL)

### Pest Risk Levels
- **Cut Worm:** High risk (77.3%)
- **Aphids:** Medium risk (69.8%)
- **Mites:** Medium risk (63.0%)
- **Caterpillar:** Low risk (42.4%)
- **Thrips:** Low risk (33.8%)
- **White Fly:** No risk (24.5%)

જો તમે વધુ છંટકાવ કરવા માંગતા હો, તો ઉપરોક્ત સૂચનાઓ અનુસાર છંટકાવ કરો.

  - **સૂચવાયેલ દવા:** 
    - Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC (1 mL)
    - Chlorothalonil (2 g)
    - Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP (2 g)
- **પેસ્ટ:** Aphids, Thrips, Whitefly
  - **સૂચવાયેલ દવા:** 
    - Tolfenpyrad 15% EC (1.25 mL)
    - spirotetramat11Imidacloprid11 (0.8 mL)
    - Pyrifluquinazon 20% WG (1 g)
    - Broflanilide 300G/L SC (0.4 mL)

### Pest Risk Levels
- **Cut Worm:** High risk (77.3%)
- **Aphids:** Medium risk (69.8%)
- **Mites:** Medium risk (63.0%)
- **Caterpillar:** Low risk (42.4%)
- **Thrips:** Low risk (33.8%)
- **White Fly:** No risk (24.5%)

જો તમે વધુ છંટકાવ કરવા માંગતા હો, તો ઉપરોક્ત સૂચનાઓ અનુસાર છંટકાવ કરો.

આજે, 11 જાન્યુઆરી 2025, તમે દવા છાંટવા માટે યોગ્ય સમય છે. આ માટેની દવા અને માત્રા નીચે મુજબ છે:

messages.en:
Today, January 11, 2025, is the right time for you to spray the drug. The medication and dosage for this are as follows:

1. **Ametoctradin + Dimethomorph** - 2 grams
2. **Broflanilide 300G/L SC** - 0.4 ml

or

1. **Metiram 44% + Dimethomorph 9%** - 2.5 g
2. **Flubendiamide 19.92 + Thiacloprid 19.92 ww SC, 480 SC** - 0.4 ml

or

2. **Isocycloseram 9.2% w/w DC + Isocycloseram 10% w/v DC** - 0.4 ml

To spray these medicines, mix it in 1 liter of water and sprinkle it.

messages.en: Is there a way to prevent branning?
messages.standalone_question: Is there any solution to avoid becoming bald?
messages.standalone_en: Is there any solution to avoid becoming bald?
messages.content_transliterated: brunig hou naye yasathi kahi upay aahe ka

messages.content:
ब्रनिग म्हणजेच अंगठा किंवा फळांवर होणारी जळणारी स्थिती. यासाठी काही उपाय आहेत:

1. **पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन**: योग्य पाण्याची मात्रा द्या. पाण्याची कमी किंवा जास्तीमुळे ब्रनिग होऊ शकते.

2. **सूर्यप्रकाश**: फळांना थेट सूर्यप्रकाशापासून वाचवण्यासाठी सावलीची व्यवस्था करा.

3. **पोषण**: योग्य पोषण द्या. कमी नायट्रोजन आणि अधिक पोटॅशियम असलेले खत वापरा.

4. **किड नियंत्रण**: किडींचा प्रादुर्भाव कमी करण्यासाठी योग्य कीटकनाशकांचा वापर करा.

5. **साफसफाई**: प्लॉटमध्ये साफसफाई ठेवा, जळणारे किंवा रोगग्रस्त फळे काढा.

6. **पाण्याचा दाब**: पाण्याचा दाब कमी करा, कारण जास्त पाण्यामुळे ब्रनिग होऊ शकते.

या उपायांनी ब्रनिगची समस्या कमी होऊ शकते.
messages.en:
Brining is a burning condition on the thumb or fruit. Here are some solutions:

1. **Water management**: Give the right amount of water. Brining can be caused by a lack or excess of water.

2. **Sunlight**: Arrange shade to protect the fruit from direct sunlight.

3. **Nutrition**: Provide proper nutrition. Use fertilizer with less nitrogen and more potassium.

4. **Pest control**: Use the right pesticides to reduce the infestation of pests.

5. **Cleaning**: Keep the plot clean, remove burning or diseased fruits.

6. **Water pressure**: Reduce water pressure, as too much water can cause brining.

These measures can reduce the problem of brining.

messages.standalone_en: Which company's calcium and magnesium spray should be used?
messages.content_transliterated: calcium ani magnicium chi favarani sathi konatya company che vapar kela pahije

messages.content:
कॅल्शियम आणि मॅग्नेशियमच्या फवारणीसाठी खालील कंपन्यांचे उत्पादन वापरले जाऊ शकते:

1. **यारा**: याराच्या कॅल्शियम नायट्रेट किंवा मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेटचा वापर केला जाऊ शकतो.
2. **इफको**: इफकोच्या कॅल्शियम आणि मॅग्नेशियम आधारित खते उपयुक्त आहेत.
3. **रिलायन्स**: रिलायन्सच्या कॅल्शियम आणि मॅग्नेशियम फर्टिलायझर्सचा वापर करणे फायदेशीर ठरू शकते.
4. **कृषी विकास**: कृषी विकासाच्या कॅल्शियम आणि मॅग्नेशियम फर्टिलायझर्सची निवड करा.

तुमच्या स्थानिक कृषी दुकानात किंवा सहकारी सोसायटीत उपलब्धता तपासा.
messages.en:
The following companies' products can be used for calcium and magnesium sprays:

1. **Yara**: Yara's calcium nitrate or magnesium sulfate can be used.
2. **IFFCO**: IFFCO's calcium and magnesium based fertilizers are useful.
3. **Reliance**: Using Reliance's calcium and magnesium fertilizers can be beneficial.
4. **Agricultural Development**: Choose calcium and magnesium fertilizers for agricultural development.

Check availability at your local agricultural shop or cooperative.

messages.content: थंडी त पानाचि कार्यशमता वाढवण्यासाठी काय फवारणी करावी
messages.en: What to spray to increase leaf efficiency in winter
messages.standalone_question: What spray should be used to enhance the efficiency of leaves during cold weather?
messages.standalone_en: What spray should be used to enhance the efficiency of leaves during cold weather?
messages.content_transliterated: thandi t panachi karyashamata vadhavanyasathi kay favarani karavi

messages.content:
थंडीच्या काळात पाण्याची कार्यक्षमता वाढवण्यासाठी तुम्ही खालील फवारणी करू शकता:

1. **सिलिकॉन आधारित फर्टिलायझर्स**: सिलिकॉन फर्टिलायझर्स वापरल्याने पाण्याची कार्यक्षमता वाढते आणि प्लांट्सच्या ताण सहन करण्याची क्षमता सुधारते.

2. **अँटिऑक्सिडंट्स**: अँटिऑक्सिडंट्सचा वापर करून प्लांट्सच्या पेशींची सुरक्षा वाढवता येते.

3. **फोलिअर स्प्रे**: पाण्याच्या कार्यक्षमतेसाठी आवश्यक पोषक तत्वांचा फोलिअर स्प्रे करा, जसे की कॅल्शियम, मॅग्नेशियम, आणि जस्त.

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी योग्य फवारणीची वेळ आणि प्रमाण ठरवण्यासाठी स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांचा सल्ला घ्या.
messages.en:
You can spray the following to increase water efficiency during the winter months:

1. **Silicon based fertilizers**: Using silicone fertilizers increases water efficiency and improves the stress tolerance of plants.

2. **Antioxidants**: The safety of plants' cells can be enhanced by using antioxidants.

3. **Foliar Spray**: Spray foliar with nutrients needed for water efficiency, such as calcium, magnesium, and zinc.

Consult a local agricultural expert to determine the right spraying time and quantity for your plot.

messages.content:
फवारणीसाठी पाण्याची मात्रा खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### सध्या फवारणीसाठी:
- **सल्फेट:** 600 ग्रॅम
- **फेरस सल्फेट:** 1.1 किलोग्राम

### पाण्याची मात्रा:
- **फवारणीसाठी पाण्याची मात्रा:** 200-300 लिटर प्रति एकर (सामान्यतः)

### फवारणीची पद्धत:
- **फर्टिगेशन पद्धत:** 
  - **फर्टिलायझर:** 24-24-0, 2.5 किलोग्राम प्रति एकर
  - **युरिया:** 2 किलोग्राम प्रति एकर
  - **फॉस्फोरिक ऍसिड:** 730 ग्रॅम प्रति एकर (फॉस्फोरिक ऍसिड इतर फर्टिलायझर्सच्या आधी 15-20 मिनिटे लागू करणे आवश्यक आहे)

### सध्या क्रॉप स्टेज:
- **क्रॉप स्टेज:** Bud initiation
- **सुरुवात तारीख:** 31 डिसेंबर 2024

जर तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असेल तर कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
The amount of water for spraying is as follows:

### Currently for spraying:
- **Sulfate:** 600 g
- **Ferrous sulfate:** 1.1 kg

### Amount of water:
- **Amount of water for spraying:** 200–300 liters per acre (usually)

### Method of spraying:
- **Fertigation method:** 
  - **Fertilizer:** 24-24-0, 2.5 kg/acre
  - **Urea:** 2 kg per acre
  - **Phosphoric acid:** 730 g/acre (phosphoric acid must be applied for 15-20 minutes before other fertilizers)

### Currently Crop Stage:
- **Crop stage:** Bud initiation
- **Start date:** 31 December 2024

If you need any more information, please let me know!

messages.content:
फवारणीसाठी प्रती लिटर प्रमाण खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### सल्फेट:
- **सल्फेट:** 600 ग्रॅम म्हणजे 0.6 किलोग्राम प्रति 1000 मिली (1 लिटर)

### फेरस सल्फेट:
- **फेरस सल्फेट:** 1.1 किलोग्राम म्हणजे 1100 ग्रॅम प्रति 1000 मिली (1 लिटर)

### एकूण प्रमाण:
- **प्रति लिटर:** 
  - सल्फेट: 0.6 ग्रॅम
  - फेरस सल्फेट: 1.1 ग्रॅम

तुम्हाला आणखी काही माहिती हवी असल्यास कृपया सांगा!
messages.en:
The ratio per liter for spraying is as follows:

### Sulfate:
* Sulfate:** 600 g is 0.6 kg per 1000 ml (1 liter)

### Ferrous sulfate:
- **Ferrous sulfate:** 1.1 kg is 1100 grams per 1000 ml (1 liter)

### Total quantity:
- **Per liter:** 
  - Sulfate: 0.6 grams
  Ferrous sulfate: 1.1 g

Please let me know if you need any more information!

messages.content:
మీరు ఈ రోజు (జనవరి 7) పిచ్చుకలపై స్ప్రే చేసారు. ఈ స్ప్రే చేయడానికి సూచనలు ఉన్నాయి:

1. **పిచ్చుకలు, థ్రిప్స్, ఆఫిడ్స్, వైట్‌ఫ్లై**:
   - **స్ప్రే కాంబినేషన్లు**:
     - 1.25 మి.లీ. **ఫ్లక్సామెటమైడ్ + బిఫెంట్రిన్**
     - 0.5 గ్రా. **ఫిప్రోనిల్ 40% + ఇమిడాక్లోప్రిడ్ 40% WG**
   - లేదా
     - 0.6 మి.లీ. **బ్రోఫ్లానిలైడ్ 20% SC**
     - 0.6 మి.లీ. **ఫిప్రోనిల్ 40% + ఇమిడాక్లోప్రిడ్ 40% WG**
   - లేదా
     - 1.25 మి.లీ. **సైయాంట్రానిలిప్రోల్ 7.3% w/w + డయాఫెంటియూరన్ 36.4% w/w SC**
     - 0.5 గ్రా. **ఫిప్రోనిల్ 40% + ఇమిడాక్లోప్రిడ్ 40% WG**

2. **బ్రాడ్ మైట్స్**:
   - **స్ప్రే కాంబినేషన్లు**:
     - 2 మి.లీ. **క్లోర్ఫెనాపిర్ 10 SC**
   - లేదా
     - 0.6 మి.లీ. **సియెనోపిరాఫెన్ 30 SC**
   - లేదా
     - 1 మి.లీ. **స్పిరోమెసిఫెన్ 240 SC (22.9 % w/w)**

మీరు స్ప్రే చేసిన తర్వాత కొన్ని రోజులు వేచి ఉండండి. ఫిల్లో యాప్ ఇంకా స్ప్రే చేయాలని సూచిస్తే, మళ్లీ స్ప్రే చేయండి.
messages.en:
You have sprayed on sparrows today (January 7). Here are instructions to do this spray:

1. **Sparrows, thrips, aphids, whitefly**:
   - **Spray combinations**:
     - 1.25 ml **Flexametamide + Bifentrin**
     - 0.5 g **Fipronil 40% + Imidacloprid 40% WG**
   -or
     - 0.6 ml **Broflanylide 20% SC**
     - 0.6 ml **Fipronil 40% + Imidacloprid 40% WG**
   -or
     - 1.25 ml **Cyantraniliprol 7.3% w/w + Diafentiurean 36.4% w/w SC**
     - 0.5 g **Fipronil 40% + Imidacloprid 40% WG**

2. **Brad Mites**:
   - **Spray combinations**:
     - 2 ml **Chlorfenapir 10 SC**
   -or
     - 0.6 ml **Cyanopiraphen 30 SC**
   -or
     - 1 ml. **Spiromecifen 240 SC (22.9 % w/w)**

Wait a few days after you've sprayed. If the Philo app still suggests spraying, spray again.

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

messages.content:
બટાકાની સાઈઝ વધારવા માટે, "nero retal" પ્લોટમાં નીચેના સ્પ્રેનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **Tolfenpyrad 15% EC** - 1.25 મીલીલિટર
2. **Spirotetramat + Imidacloprid** - 0.8 મીલીલિટર
3. **Pyrifluquinazon 20% WG** - 1 ગ્રામ
4. **Broflanilide 300G/L SC** - 0.4 મીલીલિટર

આ સ્પ્રેનો ઉપયોગ ફોલિયર એપ્લિકેશન દ્વારા કરવો જોઈએ.
messages.en:
To increase the size of the potato, you can use the following spray in the "nero retal" plot:

1. **Tolfenpyrad 15% EC** - 1.25 milliliters
2. **Spirotetramat + Imidacloprid** - 0.8 milliliters
3. **Pyrifluquinazon 20% WG** - 1 gram
4. **Broflanilide 300G/L SC** - 0.4 milliliters

This spray should be used by the Foliar application.

messages.content:
હા, તમે **મેન્કોઝેબ** ફુવારા દ્વારા આપી શકો છો. આજે, 5 જાન્યુઆરી 2025ના રોજ, તમે નીચેના સ્પ્રે સંયોજનોમાંથી કોઈ એક પસંદ કરી શકો છો:

1. **Metalaxyl Mancozeb** - 2.5 ગ્રામ
2. **Dimethomorph** - 1.2 ગ્રામ
3. **Cymoxanil 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP** - 2 ગ્રામ

આ સ્પ્રે ફોલિયર એપ્લિકેશન માટે છે અને તેનો ઉપયોગ લેટ બ્લાઇટના નિયંત્રણ માટે કરવામાં આવે છે.
messages.en:
Yes, you can give through the **mancozeb** fountain. Today, on January 5, 2025, you can choose any one of the following spray combinations:

1. **Metalaxyl Mancozeb** - 2.5 g
2. **Dimethomorph** - 1.2 grams
3. **Cymoxanil 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP** - 2 g

This spray is for foliar application and is used for the control of late blight.

messages.content:
ફિલો (Fyllo) કંપની કૃષિ ટેકનોલોજી ક્ષેત્રમાં એક અગ્રણી છે, જે ખેડૂતોને ચોકસાઈ અને સચોટતા સાથે ખેતી કરવા માટે સહાય કરે છે. તેની વિશેષતાઓમાં શામેલ છે:

1. **સંવેદક અને ડેટા**: ફિલો દ્વારા સ્થાપિત સંવેદકો અને ડેટા વિશ્લેષણ દ્વારા ખેડૂતોને તેમના પાકની સ્થિતિ અને જરૂરિયાતો વિશે ચોક્કસ માહિતી મળે છે.

2. **વિજ્ઞાન આધારિત અલ્ગોરિધમ**: ડૉ. શિખામણ્યના નેતૃત્વમાં વૈજ્ઞાનિકોની ટીમ દ્વારા વિકસિત કૃષિ અલ્ગોરિધમ, જે પાકના વિકાસને વધુ અસરકારક બનાવે છે.

3. **ગ્રાહક સેવા**: 24 કલાકની સમસ્યા ઉકેલવા સાથે 100% ગ્રાહક જાળવણી.

4. **વપરાશકર્તા મૈત્રી**: સરળ અને સમજવા માટે અનુકૂળ ઇન્ટરફેસ, જે દરેક વય જૂથના વપરાશકર્તાઓ માટે અનુકૂળ છે.

આથી, ફિલો એક સારી પસંદગી છે, ખાસ કરીને જો તમે ચોકસાઈ અને ટેકનોલોજી આધારિત ખેતીમાં રસ ધરાવો છો.
messages.en:
The Fyllo company is a pioneer in the field of agricultural technology, which helps farmers to take up farming with precision and accuracy. Its features include:

1. **Sensitive and Data**: Through the sensitivities and data analysis established by Philo, farmers get accurate information about the status and requirements of their crops.

2. **Science-based algorithm**: Dr. The agricultural algorithm developed by a team of scientists led by Shikhamanya makes crop development more effective.

3. **Customer Service**: 100% customer retention with 24 hours of problem solving.

4. **User Friendliness**: A simple and understandable interface, which is convenient for users of every age group.

Therefore, Philo is a good choice, especially if you are interested in precision and technology-based farming.

messages.content:
डावणि आणि भुरि साठी खालील जैविक बुरशी नाशकांचा वापर करू शकता:

1. **बायोफ्लॉर** - 1-2 लिटर/एकर
2. **ट्रायकोडर्मा** - 2-5 किलोग्राम/एकर
3. **पॉडोफिलम** - 1-2 लिटर/एकर

फवारणी करताना योग्य प्रमाण आणि पद्धतींचा वापर करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
The following organic fungicides can be used for left and brown:

1. **Biofloor** - 1-2 litres/acre
2. **Trichoderma** - 2-5 kg/acre
3. **Podophyllum** - 1-2 litres/acre

It is important to use the right quantity and methods while spraying.

messages.content:
भुरि आणि डावणि साठी खालील रासायनिक बुरशी नाशकांचा वापर करू शकता:

1. **कार्बेन्डाझिम** - 1-2 ग्रॅम/लिटर पाण्यात मिसळून फवारणी करा.
2. **फंडाझोल** - 1-2 ग्रॅम/लिटर पाण्यात मिसळून फवारणी करा.
3. **मेटालॅक्सिल** - 1-2 ग्रॅम/लिटर पाण्यात मिसळून फवारणी करा.

फवारणी करताना योग्य प्रमाण आणि पद्धतींचा वापर करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
The following chemical fungicides can be used for brown and brown:

1. **Carbendazim** - Mix 1-2 g/l of water and spray.
2. **Fundazole** - Mix 1-2 g/l of water and spray.
3. **Metalaxil** - Mix 1-2 g/l of water and spray.

It is important to use the right quantity and methods while spraying.

messages.standalone_question: When will you give water?
messages.standalone_en: When will you give water?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી. 

1. **કૈરો 1**: 
   - મૃદાની ભેજ: 0 kPa (સૂકું), 1 kPa (સૂકું)
   - આદર્શ ભેજ: 15 kPa
   - **પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી**.

2. **નેરો 1**: 
   - મૃદાની ભેજ: 0 kPa (સૂકું), 6 kPa (સૂકું)
   - આદર્શ ભેજ: 18 kPa
   - **પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી**.

જો ભેજ વધે તો પછી પાણી આપવું.
મારા ખેતર માં સ્પ્રે ક્યારે કરવો
messages.standalone_question: When should I apply spray in my field?
messages.standalone_en: When should I apply spray in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

messages.content_transliterated: mara khetar man spray kyare karavo

messages.standalone_question: What type of fertilizer should I use?
messages.standalone_en: What type of fertilizer should I use?

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં ખાતર આપવાની સૂચનાઓ નીચે મુજબ છે:

### કૈરો 1 (Potato - Santana)
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો**: વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **વર્તમાન સપ્તાહ**: 3

#### આજના દિવસ માટે:
1. **ફર્ટિગેશન**:
   - **Urea**: 8.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

2. **ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે**:
   - **19-19-19**: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

#### 4 દિવસ પછી:
- **ફર્ટિગેશન**:
   - **12-61-0**: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Urea**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### નેરો 1 (Potato - LR)
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો**: વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **વર્તમાન સપ્તાહ**: 3

#### આજના દિવસ માટે:
1. **ફર્ટિગેશન**:
   - **Urea**: 8 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

2. **ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે**:
   - **19-19-19**: 1.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

#### 4 દિવસ પછી:
- **ફર્ટિગેશન**:
   - **12-61-0**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Urea**: 4.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 6 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

### નોંધ:
- ફોલિયર સ્પ્રે માટે, ખાતરના મિશ્રણની માત્રા 1% થી વધુ ન હોવી જોઈએ.
- ખાતર આપતી વખતે, દરેક પ્રકારના ખાતર માટે યોગ્ય સમય અને પદ્ધતિનું ધ્યાન રાખવું.
આ પ્લોટ માં કઈ દવાની જરૂર છે

messages.content:
તમારા પ્લોટ માટે ખાતર આપવાની સૂચનાઓ નીચે મુજબ છે:

### 1. **મુખ્ય પ્લોટ (main plot)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **હાલની સપ્તાહ:** 5

#### **આજનું ખાતર (25 ડિસેમ્બર 2024):**
- **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
  - **Solubor:** 600 gm/acre

- **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
  - **Calcium Nitrate:** 3.5 kg/acre (અન્ય ખાતરોના 15-20 મિનિટ પછી)
  - **Magnesium Sulphate:** 5 kg/acre
  - **Urea:** 6.5 kg/acre

#### **આગામી ખાતર (29 ડિસેમ્બર 2024):**
- **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
  - **Potassium Nitrate:** 7 kg/acre
  - **Urea:** 5 kg/acre
  - અથવા
  - **Urea:** 6.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 6.5 kg/acre

---

### 2. **વચ્ચે વાળો (vachche valo)**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો:** વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **હાલની સપ્તાહ:** 6

#### **આજનું ખાતર (25 ડિસેમ્બર 2024):**
- **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
  - **Potassium Nitrate:** 7 kg/acre
  - **Urea:** 5 kg/acre
  - અથવા
  - **Urea:** 6.5 kg/acre
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 6.5 kg/acre

#### **આગામી ખાતર (3 જાન્યુઆરી 2025):**
- **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા:**
  - **Calcium Nitrate:** 3.5 kg/acre (અન્ય ખાતરોના 15-20 મિનિટ પછી)
  - **Sulfate of Potash:** 6.5 kg/acre

---

આ ખાતરો આપવાથી તમારા પાકની વૃદ્ધિમાં મદદ મળશે. જો વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો જણાવો.
भुरी साठी कोणता स्प्रे घ्यावा

messages.content:
તમારા પ્લોટમાં આજે (22 ડિસેમ્બર 2024) નીચેની બીમારીઓ જોવા મળી રહી છે:

### 1. **ઘરવાળો પ્લોટ (ગણવટ: 98રબ્રા 1)**
- **લેટ બ્લાઇટ**: 54.9% સંભાવના, **મધ્યમ જોખમ સ્તર**
- **અર્લી બ્લાઇટ**: 54.4% સંભાવના, **મધ્યમ જોખમ સ્તર**

### 2. **વડિયાવાળો પ્લોટ (ગણવટ: 98રબ્રા 2)**
- **લેટ બ્લાઇટ**: 54.9% સંભાવના, **મધ્યમ જોખમ સ્તર**
- **અર્લી બ્લાઇટ**: 54.4% સંભાવના, **મધ્યમ જોખમ સ્તર**

આ બીમારીઓ માટે યોગ્ય ઉપાયો અને દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરવો જરૂરી છે.
બટાકામાં સૌથી વધારે ઉત્પાદન લેવા શું કરવું પડે
messages.standalone_question: What should be done to achieve the highest yield in potatoes?
messages.standalone_en: What should be done to achieve the highest yield in potatoes?
messages.content_transliterated: batakaman sauthi vadhare utpadan leva shu karvu pade

messages.content:
બટાકામાં સૌથી વધારે ઉત્પાદન મેળવવા માટે નીચેના પગલાં અનુસરો:

1. **ગુણવત્તાવાળા બીજ**: સારા ગુણવત્તાવાળા બીજનો ઉપયોગ કરો, જે રોગમુક્ત અને સ્વસ્થ હોય.

2. **માટીના સ્વાસ્થ્ય**: જમીનનું યોગ્ય પરીક્ષણ કરો અને જરૂરી ખાતરો અને પોષક તત્વો ઉમેરો. લોયમી સૅન્ડ માટી બટાકા માટે શ્રેષ્ઠ છે.

3. **જળવાયુ વ્યવસ્થાપન**: યોગ્ય જળવાયુ વ્યવસ્થાપન કરો. જમીનની ભેજ જાળવવા માટે નિયમિત રીતે પાણી આપો, ખાસ કરીને વાવણી પછી.

4. **ફર્ટિગેશન**: ખાતરોનો યોગ્ય ઉપયોગ કરો. ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિનો ઉપયોગ કરીને પોષક તત્વો આપો.

5. **રોગ અને કીટક નિયંત્રણ**: રોગ અને કીટકોથી બચવા માટે યોગ્ય દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરો. નિયમિત રીતે પાકની તપાસ કરો.

6. **મોસમનું ધ્યાન**: પાકની વૃદ્ધિ માટે યોગ્ય મોસમ પસંદ કરો. બટાકા માટે ઠંડા અને ભેજવાળા હવામાનમાં શ્રેષ્ઠ ઉત્પાદન મળે છે.

7. **સંસ્કૃતિનું સંચાલન**: પાકની સંસ્કૃતિનું યોગ્ય સંચાલન કરો, જેમ કે યોગ્ય અંતર અને વાવણીની ઊંડાઈ.

આ પગલાંઓને અનુસરીને, તમે બટાકામાં વધુ ઉત્પાદન મેળવી શકો છો.
શું નાખવાથી ઉત્પાદન વધે

messages.content:
ઉત્પાદન વધારવા માટે નીચેના પગલાં અનુસરો:

1. **ખાતરો**: યોગ્ય ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરો, જેમ કે નાઈટ્રોજન, ફોસ્ફોરસ અને પોટેશિયમ. ખાતરોનો યોગ્ય પ્રમાણમાં ઉપયોગ કરો.

2. **જમીનનું પરીક્ષણ**: જમીનનું પરીક્ષણ કરીને પોષક તત્વોની જરૂરિયાતો જાણો અને તે મુજબ ખાતરો ઉમેરો.

3. **જળવાયુ વ્યવસ્થાપન**: યોગ્ય જળવાયુ વ્યવસ્થાપન કરો. જમીન ભેજ જાળવવા માટે નિયમિત રીતે પાણી આપો.

4. **રોગ અને કીટક નિયંત્રણ**: રોગ અને કીટકોથી બચવા માટે યોગ્ય દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરો. નિયમિત રીતે પાકની તપાસ કરો.

5. **સંસ્કૃતિનું સંચાલન**: પાકની સંસ્કૃતિનું યોગ્ય સંચાલન કરો, જેમ કે યોગ્ય અંતર અને વાવણીની ઊંડાઈ.

6. **મોસમનું ધ્યાન**: પાકની વૃદ્ધિ માટે યોગ્ય મોસમ પસંદ કરો.

7. **જમીનનું સુધારણ**: જમીનમાં ઓર્ગેનિક મટેરિયલ ઉમેરો, જેમ કે કમ્પોસ્ટ, જે જમીનની ગુણવત્તા સુધારશે.

આ પગલાંઓને અનુસરીને, તમે તમારા પાકનું ઉત્પાદન વધારી શકો છો.
અંદર મળી ગયું ઉત્પાદન લેવા શું કરવું પડે

messages.content:
ફુવારા અને પંપથી દવા આપવાની પદ્ધતિઓમાં કેટલાક મુખ્ય તફાવત છે:

1. **ફુવારા (Foliar Spray)**:
   - પાન પર સીધા છંટકાવ કરવામાં આવે છે.
   - ઝડપી અસર દર્શાવે છે, કારણ કે પાન દ્વારા તાત્કાલિક શોષણ થાય છે.
   - ખાસ કરીને જ્યારે કીટક અથવા રોગ પાન પર હોય ત્યારે વધુ અસરકારક છે.

2. **પંપ (Fertigation)**:
   - દવા અથવા ખાતર પાણી સાથે સિંચાઈના માધ્યમથી જમીનમાં આપવામાં આવે છે.
   - જમીન દ્વારા શોષણ થાય છે, જે મૂળને સીધા અસર કરે છે.
   - લાંબા ગાળાના પરિણામો માટે વધુ અસરકારક છે, ખાસ કરીને જમીનના પોષણ માટે.

આ રીતે, ફુવારા પદ્ધતિ તાત્કાલિક અસર માટે છે, જ્યારે પંપ પદ્ધતિ લાંબા ગાળાના લાભો માટે છે.

messages.content:
"Lite blite" no arth chhe "light blight" je ek prakar ni bimari chhe, je kheti ma aavti chhe. Aam to, aa bimari ma paudho par halke halke jhilmil karva lage chhe, je thi paudho ni patiyo par daag aavta hoy chhe. 

Aa bimari ni roktham mate, aapne pesticide spray karvu pade chhe. Aapne aapna plot ma light blight ni jankari joiye chhe?

नेटिवो बुरशीनाशकामध्ये कीटकनाशक मिसळून फवारणी करणे टाळावे. प्रत्येक कीटकनाशक आणि बुरशीनाशकाची कार्यप्रणाली वेगळी असते, त्यामुळे त्यांचा एकत्रित वापर केल्यास प्रभाव कमी होऊ शकतो किंवा अनपेक्षित परिणाम होऊ शकतात. 

आपण फवारणी करण्यापूर्वी, प्रत्येक उत्पादनाच्या लेबलवरील सूचना वाचा आणि योग्य प्रमाणात वापरा. जर आपल्याला शंका असेल, तर स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधा.

messages.content:
Lahsun mein palash (leaf blight) ke liye aapko "Copper Oxychloride" ya "Mancozeb" ka spray karna chahiye. 

Fertigation ke liye, aap "Urea" aur "DAP" ka istemal kar sakte hain. Urea ka 100-150 kg/ha aur DAP ka 50-100 kg/ha daalna uchit rahega. 

Yeh dawaiyan aur khad aapke lahsun ki sehat ko sudharne mein madad karengi.

messages.content:
બટાકા મો ટ્યૂમર (Tuber) વિકાસની પ્રક્રિયા દરમિયાન, કેટલીક મહત્વપૂર્ણ બાબતો ધ્યાનમાં રાખવી જોઈએ:

1. **મૂળ વિકાસ**: બટાકાના ટ્યૂમરો જમીનમાં મૂળોના વિકાસ સાથે જ વધે છે. આ સમયે, જમીનનું ભેજ અને પોષણ મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

2. **જમીનનું ભેજ**: ટ્યૂમર વિકાસ માટે જમીનનું ભેજ યોગ્ય હોવું જોઈએ. જો જમીન વધુ સૂકી હોય, તો ટ્યૂમરો યોગ્ય રીતે વિકસિત નહીં થાય.

3. **ખોરાક**: યોગ્ય ખાતર અને પોષણ આપવું જરૂરી છે, જેથી ટ્યૂમરો મજબૂત અને સ્વસ્થ બની શકે.

4. **જમીનનું તાપમાન**: બટાકા માટે 15°C થી 20°C તાપમાન શ્રેષ્ઠ છે. વધુ તાપમાન ટ્યૂમર વિકાસને અસર કરી શકે છે.

5. **પાણી**: નિયમિત રીતે પાણી આપવું, ખાસ કરીને ટ્યૂમર વિકાસની અવસ્થા દરમિયાન, મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ છે, તો કૃપા કરીને જણાવો!
હાલ બેઠક કેવી છે

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

messages.standalone_question: When should I water my field?
messages.standalone_en: When should I water my field?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે મીઠા મોજા (soil moisture) ની હાલત નીચે મુજબ છે:

1. **Dela Valu**: 
   - Soil Moisture 1: 0 kPa
   - Soil Moisture 2: 4 kPa
   - Optimal Moisture: 15 kPa
   - **Watering Not Required**: Soil moisture is below dry optimal values.

2. **Khejada Valu**: 
   - Soil Moisture 1: 0 kPa
   - Soil Moisture 2: 0 kPa
   - Optimal Moisture: 18 kPa
   - **Watering Not Required**: Soil moisture is below dry optimal values.

3. **Patsala**: 
   - Soil Moisture 1: 0 kPa
   - Soil Moisture 2: 0 kPa
   - Optimal Moisture: 18 kPa
   - **Watering Not Required**: Soil moisture is below dry optimal values.

તમે પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, પરંતુ જો મોજા વધે તો પછી પાણી આપવું જોઈએ.
મારા ખેતરમાં ક્યારે દવા છાંટવાની કરવાની જરૂર છે
messages.standalone_question: When is it necessary to spray medicine in my field?
messages.standalone_en: When is it necessary to spray medicine in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં દવા છાંટવાની જરૂર છે. અહીં દરેક ખેતરના માટેની માહિતી છે:

1. **Dela Valu**:
   - **તારીખ**: 16 ડિસેમ્બર 2024
   - **પેસ્ટ**: માઇટ્સ, રેડ સ્પાઇડર માઇટ્સ
   - **દવા**: 
     - Chlorfenapyr 10 SC - 1 mL
     - Propargite 42% + Hexythiazox 2% EC - 2.5 mL
     - Cyenopyrafen 30 SC - 0.6 mL
   - **પાણી**: 1 લિટર

**Khejada Valu** અને **Patsala** માટે કોઈ દવા છાંટવાની સૂચના નથી.

જો તમે Dela Valu માટે આ દવાઓ છાંટવા માંગતા હો, તો આજે જ કરો.

### 2. **Khejada Valu**

- **આજે (16 ડિસેમ્બર 2024)**:
  - **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ**:
    - Zinc Sulphate: 800 gm/acre
    - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
    - Manganese Sulphate: 400 gm/acre
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ**:
    - Calcium nitrate: 3.5 kg/acre
    - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre (15-20 મિનિટ પછી)

### 3. **Patsala**
- **વર્તમાન તબક્કો**: વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ (Vegetative Growth)
- **હાલની સપ્તાહ**: 4
- **આજે (16 ડિસેમ્બર 2024)**:
  - **ફોલિયર પદ્ધતિ**:
    - Zinc Sulphate: 800 gm/acre
    - Ferrous Sulphate: 600 gm/acre
    - Manganese Sulphate: 400 gm/acre
  - **ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ**:
    - Calcium nitrate: 3.5 kg/acre
    - Urea: 6.5 kg/acre (15-20 મિનિટ પછી)

messages.standalone_question: What should be done for the Super Sonaka variety in deep soil?
messages.standalone_en: What should be done for the Super Sonaka variety in deep soil?

messages.content:
Super Sonaka Kali (Grapes) साठी, खालील गोष्टींचा विचार करा:

1. **पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन**: मातीची आर्द्रता तपासा. जर माती कोरडी असेल तर योग्य प्रमाणात पाणी द्या. 

2. **खते**: फर्टिगेशनद्वारे आवश्यक खते द्या. सध्या तुम्ही "Shoot Development" टप्प्यात आहात, त्यामुळे नायट्रोजन आणि फॉस्फरस यांचे प्रमाण वाढवा.

3. **किड आणि रोग नियंत्रण**: नियमितपणे पिकांची तपासणी करा. जर कोणतेही किड किंवा रोग आढळले तर योग्य कीटकनाशक किंवा रोगनाशक वापरा.

4. **सूर्यप्रकाश**: पिकांना पुरेसा सूर्यप्रकाश मिळावा याची खात्री करा. 

5. **कापणी**: योग्य वेळी कापणी करा, जेणेकरून उत्पादनाची गुणवत्ता वाढेल.

तुमच्या पिकांच्या विशेष गरजांनुसार अधिक माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया सांगा.

messages.standalone_question: Is blue copper mud effective for gardening?
messages.standalone_en: Is blue copper mud effective for gardening?

messages.content:
Blue copper mudde (Copper Oxychloride) is an effective fungicide and can also help in controlling certain pests. It is commonly used for crops like guava to manage diseases such as leaf spot and fruit rot.

For effective application, follow these guidelines:

1. **Dilution**: Mix the recommended dosage of Blue copper mudde with water as per the manufacturer's instructions. Typically, it is around 2-3 grams per liter of water.

2. **Application Timing**: Apply during the early morning or late evening to avoid direct sunlight, which can reduce the effectiveness of the treatment.

3. **Frequency**: Depending on the severity of the pest or disease, you may need to apply it every 10-14 days.

4. **Safety Precautions**: Wear protective gear while handling and applying the pesticide to avoid skin contact and inhalation.

5. **Compatibility**: Check if it is compatible with other pesticides or fertilizers you plan to use.

If you need specific recommendations for your plots, please let me know!

Q: What is the temperature at which cold/Frost/Paala(Hindi) will burn/damage the potato crop?
A: Cold will burn the potato crop at 5 degrees Celsius and less. The minimum safe temperature for a potato crop to be left in so that it can survive is 6 degrees Celsius, so it is suggested to keep your crop above this value.
Storing potatoes at a given temperature and letting the potato crop be in the field at a certain atmospheric temperature are two different things. messages.standalone_question: What can you tell me about Downy Mild?
messages.standalone_en: What can you tell me about Downy Mild?

messages.content:
Downy mildew is a fungal disease that affects various crops, including grapes. It thrives in warm, humid conditions and can cause significant damage to leaves, stems, and fruits. Here are some key points about downy mildew:

1. **Symptoms**: Look for yellowish-green spots on the upper side of leaves, with a white, downy growth on the underside. Infected leaves may eventually turn brown and die.

2. **Conditions Favoring Growth**: High humidity, poor air circulation, and wet foliage create ideal conditions for downy mildew to develop.

3. **Management**:
   - **Cultural Practices**: Ensure proper spacing between plants for air circulation and avoid overhead watering.
   - **Fungicides**: Use appropriate fungicides as a preventive measure or at the first sign of infection. Follow local agricultural guidelines for application.
   - **Monitoring**: Regularly inspect your crops for early signs of the disease.

4. **Prevention**: Implement crop rotation and choose resistant varieties if available.

If you need specific recommendations for your grape crop or any recent disease predictions, please let me know!

1. **ಅಲ್ಟರ್ನಾರಿಯಾ (Alternaria)**:
   - ಲಕ್ಷಣಗಳು: ಎಳೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಕಪ್ಪು ಅಥವಾ ಕಂದು ಬಿಂದುಗಳು.
   - ನಿರ್ವಹಣೆ: ಫಂಗಿಸೈಡ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವುದು ಮತ್ತು ಉತ್ತಮ ವಾತಾವರಣವನ್ನು ಒದಗಿಸುವುದು.

2. **ಡೌನಿ ಮಿಲ್ಡ್ಯೂ (Downy Mildew)**:
   - ಲಕ್ಷಣಗಳು: ಎಳೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಹಳದಿ-ಹಸಿರು ಬಿಂದುಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ಕೆಳಭಾಗದಲ್ಲಿ ಬಿಳಿ, ಹೂವಿನಂತಹ ಬೆಳೆಯು.
   - ನಿರ್ವಹಣೆ: ಉತ್ತಮ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಹರಿವನ್ನು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ಮತ್ತು ಫಂಗಿಸೈಡ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವುದು.

3. **ಬ್ಯಾಕ್ಟೀರಿಯಲ್ ಬ್ಲೈಟ್ (Bacterial Blight)**:
   - ಲಕ್ಷಣಗಳು: ಎಳೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ನೀರಿನ ಬಿಂದುಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ಕಪ್ಪು ಕೀಲುಗಳು.
   - ನಿರ್ವಹಣೆ: ಸೋಂಕಿತ ಭಾಗಗಳನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದು ಹಾಕುವುದು ಮತ್ತು ಸೂಕ್ತ ಫಂಗಿಸೈಡ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವುದು.

4. **ಬ್ರೌನ್ ರಸ್ಟ್ (Brown Rust)**:
   - ಲಕ್ಷಣಗಳು: ಎಳೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಕಂದು ಬಿಂದುಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ಕಪ್ಪು ಕೀಲುಗಳು.
   - ನಿರ್ವಹಣೆ: ಉತ್ತಮ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಹರಿವನ್ನು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ಮತ್ತು ಸೂಕ್ತ ಫಂಗಿಸೈಡ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವುದು.

5. **ಪೌಡರಿ ಮಿಲ್ಡ್ಯೂ (Powdery Mildew)**:
   - ಲಕ್ಷಣಗಳು: ಎಳೆಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಬಿಳಿ ಪುಡಿ ಹೋಲಿಸುವ ಬೆಳೆಯು.
   - ನಿರ್ವಹಣೆ: ಉತ್ತಮ ಗಾಳಿಯ ಹರಿವನ್ನು ಖಚಿತಪಡಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ಮತ್ತು ಫಂಗಿಸೈಡ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಬಳಸುವುದು.

ನೀವು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಕೃಷಿ ಪ್ರದೇಶದಲ್ಲಿ ಯಾವುದೇ ನಿರ್ದಿಷ್ಟ ರೋಗಗಳ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಮಾಹಿತಿಯನ್ನು ಬೇಕಾದರೆ, ದಯವಿಟ್ಟು ತಿಳಿಸಿ!
Downy mildew control bagge tilisi
messages.standalone_question: What are the control measures for downy mildew?
messages.standalone_en: What are the control measures for downy mildew?

faq:
Q: What are the important diseases occur during seedling stage and control measures?
A: Collar rot, Damping off, Seedling blight diseases infect during seedling stage.
Drench/spray seedling with: Carbendazim @ 2.5g/ltr

Q: What are the important Pest occur during seedling stage and control measures?
A: Ants, Termites, root aphids, thrips and internal borer’s pest infect during seedling stage
Drench/spray seedling with: Chlorpyriphos @ 5mL/Ltr or Thiamethoxam @ 0.5g/ltr

Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

messages.content:
For controlling downy mildew in your grape crop, here are the recommended measures based on the recent spray schedule:

### Control Measures for Downy Mildew:
1. **Spray Schedule**:
   - **Date**: December 5, 2024
   - **Water Requirement**: 400 liters

2. **Recommended Fungicides**:
   - **Metrafenone**: 100 ml
   - **Difenoconazole**: 200 ml

### Application:
- Mix the recommended amounts of fungicides in the specified water volume and spray on the affected areas of the crop.

### Additional Tips:
- Ensure good air circulation around the plants to reduce humidity.
- Avoid overhead irrigation to keep the foliage dry.
- Regularly monitor for early signs of downy mildew and apply treatments promptly.

If you need further assistance or have any other questions, feel free to ask!
कोणता स्प्रे घेऊ

These tests provide specific data about your crop's nutrient needs, allowing for more precise fertilizer application. घड लांबी व पाकळी साठी काय करू
messages.standalone_question: What should I do for the length of the stem and the petals?
messages.standalone_en: What should I do for the length of the stem and the petals?
messages.content_transliterated: ghad lambi v pakali sathi kay karu

messages.content:
घड लांबी व पाकळी सुधारण्यासाठी खालील गोष्टी करा:

1. **पोषण**: योग्य प्रमाणात नायट्रोजन, फॉस्फरस, आणि पोटॅशियम यांसारख्या मुख्य पोषक तत्वांचा समावेश असलेले खत वापरा. मायक्रोन्यूट्रिएंट्ससुद्धा महत्त्वाचे आहेत.

2. **पाणी**: योग्य पाण्याची व्यवस्था ठेवा. मातीची आर्द्रता योग्य ठेवणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.

3. **प्रकाश**: योग्य प्रकाश मिळवण्यासाठी झाडांना योग्य जागेत ठेवा. प्रकाशाची कमतरता असल्यास, कृत्रिम प्रकाशाचा वापर करा.

4. **कापणी**: योग्य वेळी कापणी करा, जेणेकरून झाडांना नवीन वाढीसाठी उत्तेजन मिळेल.

5. **रोग नियंत्रण**: रोग आणि कीटकांपासून संरक्षणासाठी योग्य उपाययोजना करा.

जर तुम्हाला अधिक विशिष्ट शिफारसी हवी असतील, तर कृपया अधिक माहिती द्या.
પાણી ક્યારે પાવાનું
messages.standalone_question: When will it rain?
messages.standalone_en: When will it rain?

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે પાણી આપવાની જરૂરિયાત નીચે મુજબ છે:

1. **Dela Valu**:
   - **વર્તમાન મોટેર**: 2 kPa (વેટ)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ મોટેર**: 2 (વેટ) - 15 (ડ્રાય)
   - **સૂચન**: હાલના મોટેર મુજબ, પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.

2. **Khejada Valu**:
   - **વર્તમાન મોટેર**: 0 kPa (વેટ)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ મોટેર**: 2 (વેટ) - 18 (ડ્રાય)
   - **સૂચન**: હાલના મોટેર મુજબ, પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.

3. **Patsala**:
   - **વર્તમાન મોટેર**: 0 kPa (વેટ)
   - **ઓપ્ટિમલ મોટેર**: 2 (વેટ) - 18 (ડ્રાય)
   - **સૂચન**: હાલના મોટેર મુજબ, પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી.

**સારાંશ**: હાલમાં, તમારા તમામ પ્લોટમાં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી, કારણ કે મોટેર વેટ છે.
દવા ક્યારે છાંટો

messages.content:
તમારા પાક માટે દવા છાંટવાની સૂચનાઓ નીચે મુજબ છે:

1. **Dela Valu**:
   - **તારીખ**: 6 ડિસેમ્બર 2024
   - **પાકનું તબક્કો**: વેજિટેટિવ ગ્રોથ
   - **દવા**:
     - **પાન ખાવા વાળા કીટકો માટે**:
       - Chlorantraniliprole: 0.4 mL
       - Tetraniliprole 18.18 SC: 1 mL
       - Flubendiamide 19.92 + Thiacloprid 19.92 ww SC, 480 SC: 0.4 mL
     - **માઈટ્સ અને રેડ સ્પાઈડર માઇટ્સ માટે**:
       - Chlorfenapyr 10 SC: 1 mL
       - Propargite 42% + Hexythiazox 2% EC: 2.5 mL
       - Cyenopyrafen 30 SC: 0.6 mL

**સૂચન**: આ દવાઓને 1 લિટર પાણીમાં ભેળવીને છાંટો. 

અન્ય પ્લોટ માટે કોઈ દવા છાંટવાની સૂચના નથી.

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં દવા આપવાની સૂચનાઓ નીચે મુજબ છે:

### Dela Valu (4 acres)
**તારીખ:** 6 ડિસેમ્બર 2024
- **લક્ષ્ય:** પાન ખાવા વાળા કીટકો (Leaf eating Caterpillar)
  - **દવા:** 
    - 0.4 mL Chlorantraniliporle
    - 1 mL Tetraniliprole 18.18 SC
    - 0.4 mL Flubendiamide 19.92 + Thiacloprid 19.92 ww SC, 480 SC
  - **પાણી:** 1 લિટર

- **લક્ષ્ય:** માઇટ્સ અને લાલ સ્પાઇડર માઇટ્સ
  - **દવા:** 
    - 1 mL Chlorfenapyr 10 SC
    - 2.5 mL Propargite 42% + Hexythiazox 2% EC
    - 0.6 mL Cyenopyrafen 30 SC
  - **પાણી:** 1 લિટર

અન્ય ખેતરો માટે કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ દવા આપવાની સૂચના નથી. જો વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ તો જણાવશો.

messages.standalone_question: Can magnesium sulfate be mixed with urea?
messages.standalone_en: Can magnesium sulfate be mixed with urea?
messages.content_transliterated: yuriya ke saath magnesium sulfate milaya ja sakta hain kya

messages.content: हाँ, यूरिया के साथ मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट मिलाया जा सकता है। यह संयोजन पौधों को नाइट्रोजन और मैग्नीशियम दोनों प्रदान करता है, जो उनकी वृद्धि और विकास के लिए आवश्यक हैं। हालांकि, इसे मिलाने से पहले, यह सुनिश्चित करें कि मिट्टी की स्थिति और पौधों की आवश्यकताएँ सही हैं।
मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट यूरिया ओर कैल्शियम नाइट्रेट को आपस में मिला सकते है क्या
messages.standalone_question: Can magnesium sulfate be mixed with urea and calcium nitrate?
messages.standalone_en: Can magnesium sulfate be mixed with urea and calcium nitrate?
messages.content_transliterated: magnesium sulfate urea or calcium nitrate ko aapas mein mila sakte hai kya

messages.content:
मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट, यूरिया और कैल्शियम नाइट्रेट को आपस में मिलाना संभव है, लेकिन कुछ बातों का ध्यान रखना आवश्यक है:

1. **संघटन**: इन तीनों उर्वरकों को मिलाने से पहले, यह सुनिश्चित करें कि मिट्टी की स्थिति और पौधों की आवश्यकताएँ सही हैं।
2. **pH स्तर**: कैल्शियम नाइट्रेट और यूरिया के मिश्रण से pH स्तर प्रभावित हो सकता है, इसलिए मिट्टी के pH स्तर की जांच करें।
3. **पौधों की प्रतिक्रिया**: कुछ पौधों पर इस मिश्रण का प्रभाव भिन्न हो सकता है, इसलिए छोटे क्षेत्र में परीक्षण करना बेहतर होगा।

यदि आप इन बातों का ध्यान रखते हैं, तो आप इन उर्वरकों को मिलाकर उपयोग कर सकते हैं।
मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट को मिनी स्प्रिंकलर में दे सकते है क्या
messages.standalone_question: Can magnesium sulfate be used in a mini sprinkler system?
messages.standalone_en: Can magnesium sulfate be used in a mini sprinkler system?
messages.content_transliterated: magnesium sulfate ko mini sprinkler mein de sakte hai kya

messages.content: हाँ, मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट को मिनी स्प्रिंकलर सिस्टम में दिया जा सकता है। इसे पानी के साथ मिलाकर स्प्रिंकलर के माध्यम से पौधों पर छिड़काव किया जा सकता है। यह विधि पौधों को आवश्यक पोषक तत्व प्रदान करने का एक प्रभावी तरीका है। सुनिश्चित करें कि मिश्रण सही अनुपात में हो और स्प्रिंकलर सिस्टम की क्षमता के अनुसार हो।

1. **संघटन**: इन उर्वरकों को मिलाने से पहले, यह सुनिश्चित करें कि मिट्टी की स्थिति और पौधों की आवश्यकताएँ सही हैं।
2. **pH स्तर**: फास्फोरिक एसिड के साथ यूरिया और मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट मिलाने से pH स्तर प्रभावित हो सकता है। इसलिए, मिट्टी के pH स्तर की जांच करें।
3. **पौधों की प्रतिक्रिया**: कुछ पौधों पर इस मिश्रण का प्रभाव भिन्न हो सकता है, इसलिए छोटे क्षेत्र में परीक्षण करना बेहतर होगा।

यदि आप इन बातों का ध्यान रखते हैं, तो आप इन उर्वरकों को मिलाकर उपयोग कर सकते हैं।

messages.content: हाँ, कैल्शियम नाइट्रेट को मिनी स्प्रिंकलर सिस्टम में दिया जा सकता है। इसे पानी के साथ मिलाकर स्प्रिंकलर के माध्यम से पौधों पर छिड़काव किया जा सकता है। यह विधि पौधों को आवश्यक कैल्शियम और नाइट्रोजन प्रदान करने का एक प्रभावी तरीका है। सुनिश्चित करें कि मिश्रण सही अनुपात में हो और स्प्रिंकलर सिस्टम की क्षमता के अनुसार हो।
किन खादों को मिनी स्प्रिंकलर में देने से आलू की पत्तियां जल सकती हे
messages.standalone_question: Which fertilizers can cause potato leaves to burn when applied through a mini sprinkler system?
messages.standalone_en: Which fertilizers can cause potato leaves to burn when applied through a mini sprinkler system?

messages.content:
आलू की पत्तियों को जलाने वाले कुछ खादों में शामिल हैं:

1. **उच्च सांद्रता वाले उर्वरक**: जैसे कि यूरिया या कैल्शियम नाइट्रेट, यदि इनका अनुपात बहुत अधिक हो तो पत्तियों को जलाने का कारण बन सकते हैं।
2. **फास्फोरिक एसिड**: यदि इसे अत्यधिक मात्रा में उपयोग किया जाए, तो यह भी पत्तियों को नुकसान पहुँचा सकता है।
3. **सल्फेट युक्त उर्वरक**: जैसे कि मैग्नीशियम सल्फेट, यदि अधिक मात्रा में दिया जाए तो यह पत्तियों को जलाने का कारण बन सकता है।

इन खादों का उपयोग करते समय, हमेशा सही अनुपात और समय का ध्यान रखें। यदि आप स्प्रिंकलर के माध्यम से खाद डाल रहे हैं, तो इसे पानी के साथ अच्छी तरह से मिलाना सुनिश्चित करें ताकि पत्तियों पर सीधा प्रभाव न पड़े।

Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

messages.standalone_question: How much water does my field need?
messages.standalone_en: How much water does my field need?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: How much kPa should be set for a 4-inch depth soil moisture sensor?
A: The kPa value for a 4-inch depth soil moisture sensor should be set based on the **soil type** and **crop requirements**. Here are general guidelines for different soil types:

### **Sandy Soil:**
- **Optimal range:** 10–20 kPa
- **Irrigation threshold:** Above 30 kPa

### **Loamy Soil (Silty or Mixed):**
- **Optimal range:** 20–40 kPa
- **Irrigation threshold:** Above 50 kPa

### **Clay Soil:**
- **Optimal range:** 40–70 kPa
- **Irrigation threshold:** Above 80 kPa

### **Additional Considerations:**
- For **sensitive crops** like vegetables, maintain lower kPa thresholds to avoid water stress.
- For **deep-rooted crops**, kPa values may vary at different depths; calibrate accordingly.
- **Calibration** of the sensor to your specific soil and crop is essential for accuracy.

Consulting with an agronomist or referring to crop-specific irrigation guides will help you fine-tune the kPa range.

messages.standalone_en: When should I apply a spray in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

messages.standalone_question: What type of fertilizer should I apply in my field?
messages.standalone_en: What type of fertilizer should I apply in my field?

faq:
Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

messages.content:
તમારા છોડની છબીમાં કેટલીક સમસ્યાઓના સંકેતો જોવા મળે છે:

1. **પાંદડાની વળાંક**: કેટલાક પાંદડા વળાંકવાળા દેખાય છે, જે વાયરસના સંક્રમણ અથવા પર્યાવરણના તણાવ (જેમ કે ગરમી અથવા પાણીની તણાવ)નું સંકેત હોઈ શકે છે.

2. **રંગમાં ફેરફાર**: પાંદડાઓનું રંગ સામાન્ય રીતે હેલ્ધી લીલું છે, પરંતુ જો કોઈ પીળા અથવા રંગમાં ફેરફાર હોય, તો તે પોષક તત્વોની અછત અથવા કીટકના નુકસાનનું સંકેત હોઈ શકે છે.

3. **કીટકની હાજરી**: પાંદડાઓ અને ડાળીઓની નીચે કોઈ દૃશ્યમાન કીટકો, જેમ કે આફિડ અથવા સ્પાઇડર માઇટ્સ, માટે તપાસો.

4. **કુલ વૃદ્ધિ**: છોડ સારી રીતે વધતું દેખાય છે, પરંતુ કોઈ અટકેલી વૃદ્ધિ અથવા વિલ્ટિંગ માટે મોનિટર કરો.

### ભલામણો:
- **કીટકોની તપાસ**: પાંદડાઓ અને ડાળીઓની નજીકથી કીટકોના સંકેતો માટે ધ્યાનથી જુઓ.
- **પાણી આપવાની તપાસ**: ખાતરી કરો કે છોડને પૂરતું પાણી મળી રહ્યું છે, પરંતુ વધુ પાણી ન આપવું.
- **પોષક તત્વોનું સંચાલન**: પોષક તત્વોની અછત માટે જમીનનું પરીક્ષણ કરવા પર વિચાર કરો.
- **વધુ છબીઓ પ્રદાન કરો**: વધુ ચોક્કસ વિશ્લેષણ માટે, અસરગ્રસ્ત પાંદડાઓની નજીકની છબીઓ પ્રદાન કરો.

જો તમે કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ લક્ષણો અથવા ફેરફારો નોંધો છો, તો વધુ વિશ્લેષણ માટે વધુ વિગતવાર છબીઓ પ્રદાન કરો.

messages.standalone_question: When should I spray today?
messages.standalone_en: When should I spray today?

tools:
check_spray_conditions  
Gets the spray condition forecast for the next few hours for the farmer's plots and returns the condition for each hour as GOOD, MODERATE, or WORST, based on deltaT, VPD, and rainfall conditions.
faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.
